error.name: ERROR
error.flavor_text: The Pokémon you were searching for couldn't be found. ((+_+))

bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
bulbasaur.flavor_text:
While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are
stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
ivysaur.flavor_text:
Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength.
Sunlight also makes the bud on its back
grow larger.

venusaur.name: Venusaur
venusaur.flavor_text:
A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower.
The fragrance becalms those engaged
in a battle.

charmander.name: Charmander
charmander.flavor_text:
From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip
of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to
go out.

charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
charmeleon.flavor_text:
If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts
intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

charizard.name: Charizard
charizard.flavor_text:
Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an
altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very
high temperatures.

squirtle.name: Squirtle
squirtle.flavor_text:
When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside
its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

wartortle.name: Wartortle
wartortle.flavor_text:
It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to
maintain its balance while swimming.

blastoise.name: Blastoise
blastoise.flavor_text:
The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water
capable of punching holes through thick steel.

caterpie.name: Caterpie
caterpie.flavor_text:
Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that
enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

metapod.name: Metapod
metapod.flavor_text:
Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell,
the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a
harsh attack.

butterfree.name: Butterfree
butterfree.flavor_text:
It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto
the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

weedle.name: Weedle
weedle.flavor_text:
Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides
in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

kakuna.name: Kakuna
kakuna.flavor_text:
Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it
may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

beedrill.name: Beedrill
beedrill.flavor_text:
It has three poisonous stingers on its
forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab
its enemy repeatedly.

pidgey.name: Pidgey
pidgey.flavor_text:
Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up
sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

pidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
pidgeotto.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies
around its large territory in search of prey.

pidgeot.name: Pidgeot
pidgeot.flavor_text:
This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed,
seeking prey. Its large talons are feared
as wicked weapons.

rattata.name: Rattata
rattata.flavor_text:
Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you
see one, you can be certain that 40 more
live in the area.

raticate.name: Raticate
raticate.flavor_text:
Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers,
so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

spearow.name: Spearow
spearow.flavor_text:
Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around
very fast to protect its territory.

fearow.name: Fearow
fearow.flavor_text:
A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it
senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

ekans.name: Ekans
ekans.flavor_text:
The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it
wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

arbok.name: Arbok
arbok.flavor_text:
The frightening patterns on its belly have been
studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.flavor_text:
Possesses cheek sacs in which it stores electricity. This clever
forest-dweller roasts tough berries with an electric shock before
consuming them.

raichu.name: Raichu
raichu.flavor_text:
It can discharge bursts of electricity exceeding 100,000 volts—
a single strike with that amount of power would incapacitate one
of the Copperajah of my homeland.

sandshrew.name: Sandshrew
sandshrew.flavor_text:
It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If
hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp
claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.

sandslash.name: Sandslash
sandslash.flavor_text:
It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws.
Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping
them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.

nidoran-f.name: Nidoran♀
nidoran-f.flavor_text:
It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat
berries. The tip of a female Nidoran’s horn is a
bit more rounded than the tip of a male’s horn.

nidorina.name: Nidorina
nidorina.flavor_text:
If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will
band together to assault enemies with a chorus
of ultrasonic waves.

nidoqueen.name: Nidoqueen
nidoqueen.flavor_text:
It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps
between the spines on its back. The spines will
never secrete poison while young are present.

nidoran-m.name: Nidoran♂
nidoran-m.flavor_text:
Small but brave, this Pokémon will hold its
ground and even risk its life in battle to protect
the female it’s friendly with.

nidorino.name: Nidorino
nidorino.flavor_text:
It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively.
The potency of its poison increases along with
the level of adrenaline present in its body.

nidoking.name: Nidoking
nidoking.flavor_text:
Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful
and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail
and diamond-crushing horn.

clefairy.name: Clefairy
clefairy.flavor_text:
It can be found in quiet mountain areas on a full moon's night.
Its dancing and its tiny, faintly glowing wings confer upon it a
lovely fairylike quality.

clefable.name: Clefable
clefable.flavor_text:
Legend says that on clear, quiet nights, it listens for the voices
of its kin living on the moon. I, too, often think of my homeland,
so far away.

vulpix.name: Vulpix
vulpix.flavor_text:
In its belly burns a fire, which Vulpix spits out in the form of
fireballs. When young, this Pokémon has but one white tail.
As the Pokémon matures, this single tail splits into six.

ninetales.name: Ninetales
ninetales.flavor_text:
The coat of gleaming golden fur is quite magnificent.
This species is said to store sacred power in its nine long tails
and to live for a millennium.

jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
jigglypuff.flavor_text:
By freely changing the wavelength of its voice,
Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to
make any listener sleepy.

wigglytuff.name: Wigglytuff
wigglytuff.flavor_text:
It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate.
In particular, the curl on its forehead has a
texture that’s perfectly heavenly.

zubat.name: Zubat
zubat.flavor_text:
Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this
Pokémon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that
it emits from its mouth as it flies.

golbat.name: Golbat
golbat.flavor_text:
It sinks its sharp fangs into other creatures and slurps up their
blood. A closer look at the fangs reveals that they are hollow
and akin to straws.

oddish.name: Oddish
oddish.flavor_text:
During the day, it stays in the cold underground
to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

gloom.name: Gloom
gloom.flavor_text:
What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey.
It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

vileplume.name: Vileplume
vileplume.flavor_text:
The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it
contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

paras.name: Paras
paras.flavor_text:
Sometimes seen at the foot of trees in humid forests.
The mushrooms on its back—called tochukaso—are not present
on infant specimens and instead emerge as Paras matures.

parasect.name: Parasect
parasect.flavor_text:
Mushroom-lacking specimens of this Pokémon lie unmoving in
the forest, lending credence to the hypothesis that the large
mushroom is in control of Parasect's actions.

venonat.name: Venonat
venonat.flavor_text:
Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you
can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

venomoth.name: Venomoth
venomoth.flavor_text:
The powdery scales on its wings are hard to
remove from skin. They also contain poison
that leaks out on contact.

diglett.name: Diglett
diglett.flavor_text:
It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth.
It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy
to spot.

dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
dugtrio.flavor_text:
These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea
level. No one knows what it’s like underground.

meowth.name: Meowth
meowth.flavor_text:
It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good
mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look
at its hoard of treasures.

persian.name: Persian
persian.flavor_text:
Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that
of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship
between the two is one of mutual disdain.

psyduck.name: Psyduck
psyduck.flavor_text:
Suffers perpetual headaches. If the agony grows too great,
Psyduck's latent power erupts, contrary to Psyduck's intent.
Ergo, I am exploring ways to ease the pain.

golduck.name: Golduck
golduck.flavor_text:
Its body is strong, and it has webbing on its hands and feet.
Golduck can swim easily through rough seas, clawing its way
through the high waves.

mankey.name: Mankey
mankey.flavor_text:
An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers
easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

primeape.name: Primeape
primeape.flavor_text:
It stops being angry only when nobody else
is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

growlithe.name: Growlithe
growlithe.flavor_text:
They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous
rock components in the fur of this species are the result of
volcanic activity in its habitat.

arcanine.name: Arcanine
arcanine.flavor_text:
Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its
bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a
deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.

poliwag.name: Poliwag
poliwag.flavor_text:
In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokémon will
cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act
like a suction cup.

poliwhirl.name: Poliwhirl
poliwhirl.flavor_text:
This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When
captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’
grasp and escape.

poliwrath.name: Poliwrath
poliwrath.flavor_text:
Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial
arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out
powerful punches.

abra.name: Abra
abra.flavor_text:
Spends 18 hours of the day sleeping. Even while asleep, Abra
can control its psychic powers—should danger approach, the
Pokémon will simply teleport away.

kadabra.name: Kadabra
kadabra.flavor_text:
There are rumors that a child with mystical powers became
a Kadabra; however, this remains unverified. I suspect that
the spoon Kadabra holds enhances its brain waves.

alakazam.name: Alakazam
alakazam.flavor_text:
The longer Alakazam lives, the larger and heavier its head
becomes. Our tests have shown that the strength of its psychic
powers correlates positively to the weight of its head.

machop.name: Machop
machop.flavor_text:
Though as small as a child, it has strength enough to easily throw
a well-built adult. Striving to become ever stronger, Machop
trains by carrying a Graveler on its shoulders.

machoke.name: Machoke
machoke.flavor_text:
A sturdy creature boasting a robust physique and boundless
stamina. Loves training above all else and voluntarily assists with
tasks such as construction and clearing land.

machamp.name: Machamp
machamp.flavor_text:
In close combat, its four arms afford it offensive and defensive
supremacy. In but a blink, this valiant Pokémon can overwhelm
its foes with more than 1,000 blows from its fists.

bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
bellsprout.flavor_text:
Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares
tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

weepinbell.name: Weepinbell
weepinbell.flavor_text:
When hungry, it swallows anything that moves.
Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

victreebel.name: Victreebel
victreebel.flavor_text:
Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey.
Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day,
bones and all.

tentacool.name: Tentacool
tentacool.flavor_text:
They fire beams from the glassy, magenta orbs that resemble
eyes atop their heads, and they drift in shallow seas. During low
tide, they can sometimes be found on beaches, desiccated.

tentacruel.name: Tentacruel
tentacruel.flavor_text:
It has 80 tentacles, each with a venomous tip. These tentacles
are also extendible, lengthening when Tentacruel attempts to
catch prey. Use caution.

geodude.name: Geodude
geodude.flavor_text:
Makes its home in mountainous regions, using its arms to climb
along harsh mountain roads. Can be troublesome—carelessly
kicking one will cause it to fly into a rage and chase after you.

graveler.name: Graveler
graveler.flavor_text:
Dwells in holes dug into sheer walls of stone. It enjoys rolling
down slopes as though it were a boulder during a rockfall,
so keep an eye upward while traversing mountain roads.

golem.name: Golem
golem.flavor_text:
The rocklike shell is shed each year. The cast-off shell then
crumbles, reverting to a mass of soil, which can be spread across
fields to promote crop growth.

ponyta.name: Ponyta
ponyta.flavor_text:
These Pokémon live in herds out in the grassland. Newborn
foals lack their fiery manes, which will develop about an hour
after birth.

rapidash.name: Rapidash
rapidash.flavor_text:
Fiery mane aglow, Rapidash darts like an arrow across the land.
This prodigiously swift creature can traverse the vast region of
Hisui in a day and a half.

slowpoke.name: Slowpoke
slowpoke.flavor_text:
When this Pokémon’s tail is soaked in water,
sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait
to lure in and fish up other Pokémon.

slowbro.name: Slowbro
slowbro.flavor_text:
Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokémon
into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go,
it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.

magnemite.name: Magnemite
magnemite.flavor_text:
A bizarre Pokémon with but a single eye embedded in an iron
sphere. I suspect this creature levitates due to the magnetism it
emits from its arms, which resemble horseshoe-shaped magnets.

magneton.name: Magneton
magneton.flavor_text:
Three Magnemite gathered to evolve into this Pokémon.
The source of much vexation on my part, as its powerful
magnetism destroys my research equipment.

farfetchd.name: Farfetch’d
farfetchd.flavor_text:
They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all
of them use it in the same way. Several distinct
styles of stalk fighting have been observed.

doduo.name: Doduo
doduo.flavor_text:
Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this
Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

dodrio.name: Dodrio
dodrio.flavor_text:
One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form
a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph
in prairies.

seel.name: Seel
seel.flavor_text:
Loves freezing-cold conditions.
Relishes swimming in a frigid climate
of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

dewgong.name: Dewgong
dewgong.flavor_text:
Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by
even intense cold, it swims powerfully
in icy waters.

grimer.name: Grimer
grimer.flavor_text:
Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid
to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.

muk.name: Muk
muk.flavor_text:
Smells so awful, it can cause fainting.
Through degeneration of its nose,
it lost its sense of smell.

shellder.name: Shellder
shellder.flavor_text:
Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is
vulnerable only when its shell is open.

cloyster.name: Cloyster
cloyster.flavor_text:
Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to
open, even by those with superior strength.

gastly.name: Gastly
gastly.flavor_text:
Gaseous and completely impalpable. Also highly dangerous—
inhaling part of its poisonous body will cause one to
faint instantly.

haunter.name: Haunter
haunter.flavor_text:
This frightful, malevolent spirit can glide through walls,
appearing wherever it likes. According to rumor, victims of
a Haunter's lick will wither to death day by day.

gengar.name: Gengar
gengar.flavor_text:
Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away
the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take
hold of a protective charm posthaste!

onix.name: Onix
onix.flavor_text:
This chain of immense stones resembles a giant serpent. Tremors
shake the earth above as it burrows deep beneath the ground,
feeding on boulders as it goes.

drowzee.name: Drowzee
drowzee.flavor_text:
If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes
show you dreams it had eaten in the past.

hypno.name: Hypno
hypno.flavor_text:
Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will
try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

krabby.name: Krabby
krabby.flavor_text:
If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself
with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

kingler.name: Kingler
kingler.flavor_text:
Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s
not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.

voltorb.name: Voltorb
voltorb.flavor_text:
An enigmatic Pokémon that happens to bear a resemblance to a
Poké Ball. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has
stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.

electrode.name: Electrode
electrode.flavor_text:
The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in
composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pokémon lets
loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.

exeggcute.name: Exeggcute
exeggcute.flavor_text:
These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a
group of six. The minute even one member of the
group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.

exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
exeggutor.flavor_text:
When they work together, Exeggutor’s three
heads can put out powerful psychic energy.
Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.

cubone.name: Cubone
cubone.flavor_text:
This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased
mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry,
but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.

marowak.name: Marowak
marowak.flavor_text:
When this Pokémon evolved, the skull of its
mother fused to it. Marowak’s temperament also
turned vicious at the same time.

hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
hitmonlee.flavor_text:
The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy
legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
hitmonchan.flavor_text:
Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to
need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

lickitung.name: Lickitung
lickitung.flavor_text:
Wields its long tongue deftly, as though it were an arm.
The Pokémon's viscous saliva, once it has been collected and
boiled down, yields a strong and highly useful adhesive.

koffing.name: Koffing
koffing.flavor_text:
It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing
used to be more plentiful in the Galar region
than they are now.

weezing.name: Weezing
weezing.flavor_text:
It can’t suck in air quite as well as a Galarian
Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more
potent than those of its counterpart.

rhyhorn.name: Rhyhorn
rhyhorn.flavor_text:
Ludicrously strong—when it butts heads with a mountain, it is
the mountain that shatters. But its short legs struggle with turns,
and it is incapable of stopping unless it collides with something.

rhydon.name: Rhydon
rhydon.flavor_text:
Rapidly rotates its horn to bore through bedrock. It swaggers
around volcanic regions, protected from the lava's heat by its
tough, armorlike hide.

chansey.name: Chansey
chansey.flavor_text: This purehearted Pokémon shares its eggs with the injured.

tangela.name: Tangela
tangela.flavor_text:
It is cloaked entirely in blue vines, preventing any glimpse of
its true identity. The vines impart a refreshing sensation when
chewed—they're useful as a spice.

kangaskhan.name: Kangaskhan
kangaskhan.flavor_text:
There are records of a lost human child being
raised by a childless Kangaskhan.

horsea.name: Horsea
horsea.flavor_text:
They swim with dance-like motions and cause
whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which
of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.

seadra.name: Seadra
seadra.flavor_text:
Seadra’s mouth is slender, but its suction power
is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food
that’s larger than the opening of its mouth.

goldeen.name: Goldeen
goldeen.flavor_text:
Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed
like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

seaking.name: Seaking
seaking.flavor_text:
Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed
boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from
washing away.

staryu.name: Staryu
staryu.flavor_text:
Fish Pokémon nibble at it, but Staryu isn’t
bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even
if part of it is completely torn off.

starmie.name: Starmie
starmie.flavor_text:
Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed.
As this Pokémon cruises through the ocean, it
absorbs tiny plankton.

mr-mime.name: Mr. Mime
mr-mime.flavor_text:
The behavior of this clown-like Pokémon reminds one of
pantomime. It creates invisible walls using a force emitted
from its fingertips.

scyther.name: Scyther
scyther.flavor_text:
The large, wickedly sharp scythes on its forearms are truly
fearsome weapons. Prey's attempts to flee are unfailingly
thwarted by this Pokémon's nimble motions.

jynx.name: Jynx
jynx.flavor_text:
The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and
delicate voices. Some of these Pokémon have
even gathered a fan base.

electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
electabuzz.flavor_text:
Feeds on electrical energy. During sudden showers beneath
looming thunderclouds, one can observe Electabuzz scaling tall
trees, where the Pokémon will then wait for lightning to strike.

magmar.name: Magmar
magmar.flavor_text:
Legend has it that this Pokémon was born from the crater of a
volcano. When wounded, it bathes in lava to heal its body, much
as one would soak in a hot spring.

pinsir.name: Pinsir
pinsir.flavor_text:
This Pokémon clamps its pincers down on its prey
and then either splits the prey in half or flings
it away.

tauros.name: Tauros
tauros.flavor_text:
The Tauros of the Galar region are volatile in
nature, and they won’t allow people to ride on
their backs.

magikarp.name: Magikarp
magikarp.flavor_text:
A feeble, pitiful imbecile of a Pokémon that is nonetheless very
hardy. Unperturbed by turbid water, it can be found living in all
sorts of places.

gyarados.name: Gyarados
gyarados.flavor_text:
I suspect this Pokémon to be the true identity of a dragon
written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire
village with white-hot beams from its maw.

lapras.name: Lapras
lapras.flavor_text:
Crossing icy seas is no issue for this
cold-resistant Pokémon. Its smooth skin
is a little cool to the touch.

ditto.name: Ditto
ditto.flavor_text:
When it encounters another Ditto, it will move
faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.

eevee.name: Eevee
eevee.flavor_text:
Harbors the potential to evolve into manifold forms.
Within Eevee lies the key to the mysteries of Pokémon
evolution—I'm certain of it.

vaporeon.name: Vaporeon
vaporeon.flavor_text:
Tests show that its cells closely resemble water molecules, which
perhaps explains its ability to conceal its form while submerged.
I believe the origins of mermaid folklore lie with this Pokémon.

jolteon.name: Jolteon
jolteon.flavor_text:
Bristles its fur into sharp, needlelike points when enraged.
One can hear electricity crackle in its breath when it exhales.

flareon.name: Flareon
flareon.flavor_text:
Flames burn within a saclike organ inside this Pokémon.
When Flareon inhales, these flames grow in intensity, reaching
a mighty 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

porygon.name: Porygon
porygon.flavor_text:
It has no discernible heartbeat and does not seem to draw
breath, and yet it appears to function without issue. I cannot
even begin to explain this utterly bizarre anomaly.

omanyte.name: Omanyte
omanyte.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is a member of an ancient, extinct
species. Omanyte paddles through water with its
10 tentacles, looking like it’s just drifting along.

omastar.name: Omastar
omastar.flavor_text:
Omastar’s sharp fangs could crush rock, but the
Pokémon can attack only the prey that come
within reach of its tentacles.

kabuto.name: Kabuto
kabuto.flavor_text:
While some say this species has gone extinct,
Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common
in some places.

kabutops.name: Kabutops
kabutops.flavor_text:
The cause behind the extinction of this species is
unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokémon
that inhabited warm seas.

aerodactyl.name: Aerodactyl
aerodactyl.flavor_text:
Aerodactyl’s sawlike fangs can shred skin to
tatters—even the skin of Steel-type Pokémon.

snorlax.name: Snorlax
snorlax.flavor_text:
This glutton appears in villages without warning and devours the
entirety of their rice granaries—such occurrences have long been
counted among the gravest of disasters.

articuno.name: Articuno
articuno.flavor_text:
This Pokémon can control ice at will. Articuno
is said to live in snowy mountains riddled
with permafrost.

zapdos.name: Zapdos
zapdos.flavor_text:
Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon. It’s said
that when Zapdos rubs its feathers together,
lightning will fall immediately after.

moltres.name: Moltres
moltres.flavor_text:
There are stories of this Pokémon using its
radiant, flame-cloaked wings to light up paths
for those lost in the mountains.

dratini.name: Dratini
dratini.flavor_text:
This Pokémon was long considered to be no
more than a myth. The small lump on a Dratini’s
forehead is actually a horn that’s still coming in.

dragonair.name: Dragonair
dragonair.flavor_text:
This Pokémon gathers power in the orbs on its
tail and controls the weather. When enshrouded
by an aura, Dragonair has a mystical appearance.

dragonite.name: Dragonite
dragonite.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is known as the Sea Incarnate.
Figureheads that resemble Dragonite decorate
the bows of many ships.

mewtwo.name: Mewtwo
mewtwo.flavor_text:
Its DNA is almost the same as Mew’s. However,
its size and disposition are vastly different.

mew.name: Mew
mew.flavor_text:
When viewed through a microscope, this
Pokémon’s short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.

chikorita.name: Chikorita
chikorita.flavor_text:
In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at
bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf,
becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy,
friendly atmosphere all around.

bayleef.name: Bayleef
bayleef.flavor_text:
Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each
tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this
shoot makes people peppy.

meganium.name: Meganium
meganium.flavor_text:
The fragrance of Meganium’s flower soothes and calms
emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its
becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

cyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cyndaquil.flavor_text:
Hails from the Johto region. Though usually curled into a ball
due to its timid disposition, it harbors tremendous firepower.

quilava.name: Quilava
quilava.flavor_text:
This creature's fur is most mysterious—it is wholly impervious to
the burning touch of flame. Should Quilava turn its back to you,
take heed! Such a posture indicates a forthcoming attack.

typhlosion.name: Typhlosion
typhlosion.flavor_text:
Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them
to the afterlife. I believe its form has been influenced by the
energy of the sacred mountain towering at Hisui's center.

totodile.name: Totodile
totodile.flavor_text:
Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile’s jaws are very
powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully
nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

croconaw.name: Croconaw
croconaw.flavor_text:
Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will
absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are
forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible
to remove when they have sunk in.

feraligatr.name: Feraligatr
feraligatr.flavor_text:
Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth.
In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful
hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

sentret.name: Sentret
sentret.flavor_text:
When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard.
The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When
this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes
incapable of sleep due to fear.

furret.name: Furret
furret.flavor_text:
Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly
squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its
short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.

hoothoot.name: Hoothoot
hoothoot.flavor_text:
It begins to hoot at the same time every day.
Some Trainers use them in place of clocks.

noctowl.name: Noctowl
noctowl.flavor_text:
When it needs to think, it rotates its head
180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

ledyba.name: Ledyba
ledyba.flavor_text:
These very cowardly Pokémon join together and
use Reflect to protect their nest.

ledian.name: Ledian
ledian.flavor_text:
It flies through the night sky, sprinkling sparkly
dust. According to some, if that dust sticks to
you, good things will happen to you.

spinarak.name: Spinarak
spinarak.flavor_text:
Although the poison from its fangs isn’t that
strong, it’s potent enough to weaken prey that
gets caught in its web.

ariados.name: Ariados
ariados.flavor_text:
It spews threads from its mouth to catch its
prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go
hunt aggressively.

crobat.name: Crobat
crobat.flavor_text:
Its hind limbs have become another set of wings. Crobat
expertly maneuvers its four wings to dart in exquisite fashion
through even the most confined caves without losing any speed.

chinchou.name: Chinchou
chinchou.flavor_text:
On the dark ocean floor, its only means of
communication is its constantly flashing lights.

lanturn.name: Lanturn
lanturn.flavor_text:
This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds
its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver
an electrical attack.

pichu.name: Pichu
pichu.flavor_text:
Pichu stores electricity in the sacs on its cheeks but discharges it
inadvertently when agitated or excited. Being yet immature,
the Pokémon's handling of electricity is rather inept.

cleffa.name: Cleffa
cleffa.flavor_text:
In silhouette, they resemble twinkling starlight. When shooting
stars rain from the night sky, Cleffa gather in numbers and dance
as though they are indeed incarnations of the stars.

igglybuff.name: Igglybuff
igglybuff.flavor_text:
Taking advantage of the softness of its body,
Igglybuff moves as if bouncing. Its body turns a
deep pink when its temperature rises.

togepi.name: Togepi
togepi.flavor_text:
This ovate creature is frequently mistaken for a moving egg
when encountered out in the fields or in the mountains.
Its guileless smile soothes the soul.

togetic.name: Togetic
togetic.flavor_text:
No records exist of Togetic being seen in the wilds. Rumors
abound that it evolves under the loving care of a trusted human
companion, upon whom the Pokémon then bestows great joy.

natu.name: Natu
natu.flavor_text:
Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to
hop to get around. It is always staring
at something.

xatu.name: Xatu
xatu.flavor_text:
This odd Pokémon can see both the past and
the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.

mareep.name: Mareep
mareep.flavor_text:
Rubbing its fleece generates electricity.
You’ll want to pet it because it’s cute, but if you
use your bare hand, you’ll get a painful shock.

flaaffy.name: Flaaffy
flaaffy.flavor_text:
It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it
stores up too much, it will start to go bald in
those patches.

ampharos.name: Ampharos
ampharos.flavor_text:
Its tail shines bright and strong. It has been
prized since long ago as a beacon for sailors.

bellossom.name: Bellossom
bellossom.flavor_text:
Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance.
They say that the dance is a ritual to summon
the sun.

marill.name: Marill
marill.flavor_text:
Even after Marill swims in a cold sea, its water-
repellent fur dries almost as soon as Marill leaves
the water. That’s why this Pokémon is never cold.

azumarill.name: Azumarill
azumarill.flavor_text:
These Pokémon create air-filled bubbles. When
Azurill play in rivers, Azumarill will cover them
with these bubbles.

sudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
sudowoodo.flavor_text:
Though it pretends to be a tree, it fails to fool even children.
To the touch, its body feels more like rock than tree bark.
Sudowoodo's extreme aversion to water merits special note.

politoed.name: Politoed
politoed.flavor_text:
The cry of a male is louder than that of a female.
Male Politoed with deep, menacing voices find
more popularity with the opposite gender.

hoppip.name: Hoppip
hoppip.flavor_text:
This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the
approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other
Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.

skiploom.name: Skiploom
skiploom.flavor_text:
Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises
above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens
depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon
is sometimes used as a thermometer.

jumpluff.name: Jumpluff
jumpluff.flavor_text:
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to
foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it
encounters cold air while it is floating.

aipom.name: Aipom
aipom.flavor_text:
This treetop dweller possesses a tail as dexterous as a hand.
Ancient writings describe this Pokémon as a one-armed oddity.

sunkern.name: Sunkern
sunkern.flavor_text:
Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so
because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its
body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on
morning dew.

sunflora.name: Sunflora
sunflora.flavor_text:
Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around
actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as
soon as the sun goes down for the night.

yanma.name: Yanma
yanma.flavor_text:
Its frail wings are so thin that one can see clear through them.
However, during flight these wings exhibit the power to churn
air with force enough to launch a house skyward.

wooper.name: Wooper
wooper.flavor_text:
When walking on land, it covers its body with a
poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.

quagsire.name: Quagsire
quagsire.flavor_text:
Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head
on the river bottom as it swims but seems not
to care.

espeon.name: Espeon
espeon.flavor_text:
Wields an arcane power with which it can predict the weather
and even people's thoughts. When bathed in sunshine, the
scarlet orb on its brow glows and builds energy.

umbreon.name: Umbreon
umbreon.flavor_text:
It is most active in the wee hours of the night, when moonlight
bathes the land. Its large eyes can pierce the darkness and
perceive prey with absolute clarity.

murkrow.name: Murkrow
murkrow.flavor_text:
Widely shunned as a bearer of ill fortune. Upon crossing paths
with this creature, I've been told one must chant ”Workrum,
Workrum—bad luck, don't come” as a protective incantation.

slowking.name: Slowking
slowking.flavor_text:
Slowking can solve any problem presented to it,
but no one can understand a thing Slowking says.

misdreavus.name: Misdreavus
misdreavus.flavor_text:
It conceals itself in darkness, sending chills up travelers' spines
with its childlike weeping. As it observes the frightened travelers
with glee, the red orbs upon its chest let off an eerie light.

unown.name: Unown
unown.flavor_text:
It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pokémon are truly
living creatures. I've pointed out that the species' many forms
resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.

wobbuffet.name: Wobbuffet
wobbuffet.flavor_text:
To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly
in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

girafarig.name: Girafarig
girafarig.flavor_text:
Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for
thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it
can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.

pineco.name: Pineco
pineco.flavor_text:
It sticks tree bark to itself with its saliva,
making itself thicker and larger. Elderly Pineco
are ridiculously huge.

forretress.name: Forretress
forretress.flavor_text:
In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the
inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day,
no one has ever seen that sight.

dunsparce.name: Dunsparce
dunsparce.flavor_text:
The nests Dunsparce live in are mazes of tunnels.
They never get lost in their own nests—they can
tell where they are by the scent of the dirt.

gligar.name: Gligar
gligar.flavor_text:
Its tail is tipped by a thick, horrible stinger. To bring down prey,
it will first obscure their vision by covering their faces with its
body, and then it will use the stinger to inject them with venom.

steelix.name: Steelix
steelix.flavor_text:
This Pokémon evolved through use of a strange item. Its body is
coated with steel powder and notably hard—not even diamond
can leave so much as a scratch.

snubbull.name: Snubbull
snubbull.flavor_text:
In contrast to its appearance, it’s quite
timid. When playing with other puppy
Pokémon, it sometimes gets bullied.

granbull.name: Granbull
granbull.flavor_text:
Although it’s popular with young people,
Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it’s totally
incompetent as a watchdog.

qwilfish.name: Qwilfish
qwilfish.flavor_text:
Fishers detest this troublesome Pokémon because it sprays
poison from its spines, getting it everywhere. A different form
of Qwilfish lives in other regions.

scizor.name: Scizor
scizor.flavor_text:
Evolved by way of a curious item. The shell covering its body
has been shown to be stronger than forged steel.

shuckle.name: Shuckle
shuckle.flavor_text:
The berries stored in its vaselike shell eventually
become a thick, pulpy juice.

heracross.name: Heracross
heracross.flavor_text:
This Pokémon has an unparalleled horn. Heracross itself
demonstrates tremendous power—it's capable of throwing
several people trained in the traditional arts of war at once.

sneasel.name: Sneasel
sneasel.flavor_text:
Its sturdy, curved claws are ideal for traversing precipitous cliffs.
From the tips of these claws drips a venom that infiltrates the
nerves of any prey caught in Sneasel's grasp.

teddiursa.name: Teddiursa
teddiursa.flavor_text:
It licks its paws because of the sweet honey that has soaked into
them. It is cunning, stealing into the nests of Combee and taking
for itself the honey that the Combee have amassed.

ursaring.name: Ursaring
ursaring.flavor_text:
When the cold season arrives in Hisui, this Pokémon will wander
fields and mountains alike in search of its favorite berries.
Ursaring's hunger during this time makes it a ferocious danger.

slugma.name: Slugma
slugma.flavor_text:
Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely
hot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon’s body,
carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

magcargo.name: Magcargo
magcargo.flavor_text:
Magcargo’s body temperature is approximately
18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact.
If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly
turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.

swinub.name: Swinub
swinub.flavor_text:
Swinub excels at sniffing out mushrooms buried beneath grass or
snow. Since ancient times, the people of Hisui have often relied
upon this skill.

piloswine.name: Piloswine
piloswine.flavor_text:
The long fur of this Pokémon covers its eyes, ears, and even
limbs, allowing Piloswine to resist harshly frigid conditions.
The Pokémon's white tusks can be used to defeat its enemies.

corsola.name: Corsola
corsola.flavor_text:
These Pokémon live in warm seas.
In prehistoric times, many lived in the
oceans around the Galar region as well.

remoraid.name: Remoraid
remoraid.flavor_text:
Spits water from its mouth with incredible accuracy. It captures
Burmy by shooting them down off the branches from which
they dangle.

octillery.name: Octillery
octillery.flavor_text:
While Octillery still shoots water from its mouth, the drastic
anatomical difference between it and Remoraid meant that for
a long time, no one believed the former evolved from the latter.

delibird.name: Delibird
delibird.flavor_text:
It has a generous habit of sharing its food with
people and Pokémon, so it’s always scrounging
around for more food.

mantine.name: Mantine
mantine.flavor_text:
This calm and gentle Pokémon swims gracefully through the sea.
After building speed, it can leap out of the water. It is often
misidentified as a bird Pokémon due to this behavior.

skarmory.name: Skarmory
skarmory.flavor_text:
People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed
feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element
in heraldic designs.

houndour.name: Houndour
houndour.flavor_text:
They make repeated eerie howls before dawn
to call attention to their pack.

houndoom.name: Houndoom
houndoom.flavor_text:
Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long
time ago thought it was the grim reaper and
feared it.

kingdra.name: Kingdra
kingdra.flavor_text:
Scales shed by this Pokémon have such a
splendorous gleam to them that they’ve been
given to royalty as gifts.

phanpy.name: Phanpy
phanpy.flavor_text:
Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others
gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water.
These Pokémon can be seen drying their soaking-wet
bodies at the edge of water.

donphan.name: Donphan
donphan.flavor_text:
If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house
could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon
helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.

porygon2.name: Porygon2
porygon2.flavor_text:
A bizarre item caused this Pokémon to evolve. While it now
exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology
remains inscrutable.

stantler.name: Stantler
stantler.flavor_text:
Its strangely shaped antlers have the power to bewitch those
who see them. Medicine made by grinding up the black orbs
from fallen antlers is an effective treatment for insomnia.

smeargle.name: Smeargle
smeargle.flavor_text:
It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from
the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol,
Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

tyrogue.name: Tyrogue
tyrogue.flavor_text:
Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because
it will slug any handy target without warning.

hitmontop.name: Hitmontop
hitmontop.flavor_text:
After doing a handstand to throw off the
opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.

smoochum.name: Smoochum
smoochum.flavor_text:
This is a very curious Pokémon. Smoochum
decides what it likes and dislikes by touching
things with its lips.

elekid.name: Elekid
elekid.flavor_text:
They generate electricity by spinning their arms. During a
thunderstorm, if one hears the lively voices of children out in the
wilderness, what one is actually hearing are the voices of Elekid.

magby.name: Magby
magby.flavor_text:
This Pokémon lives in volcanic areas. With each breath, sparks
spurt from its mouth and nose. When Magby is in good health,
its flames gain a yellow tint.

miltank.name: Miltank
miltank.flavor_text:
This Pokémon needs to be milked every day,
or else it will fall ill. The flavor of Miltank milk
changes with the seasons.

blissey.name: Blissey
blissey.flavor_text:
A kindhearted Pokémon that will care for any sick person or
Pokémon until their health improves. The eggs it lays are
delicious and bring good fortune to those who eat them.

raikou.name: Raikou
raikou.flavor_text:
Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of
this Pokémon send shock waves shuddering through the
air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come
crashing down.

entei.name: Entei
entei.flavor_text:
Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is
thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano.
It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all
that they touch.

suicune.name: Suicune
suicune.flavor_text:
Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water.
It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon has
the power to purify dirty water.

larvitar.name: Larvitar
larvitar.flavor_text:
It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large
mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.

pupitar.name: Pupitar
pupitar.flavor_text:
It will not stay still, even while it’s a pupa.
It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.

tyranitar.name: Tyranitar
tyranitar.flavor_text:
The quakes caused when it walks make even
great mountains crumble and change
the surrounding terrain.

lugia.name: Lugia
lugia.flavor_text:
Lugia’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its
wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this
Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

ho-oh.name: Ho-Oh
ho-oh.flavor_text:
Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle
at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to
bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at
the foot of a rainbow.

celebi.name: Celebi
celebi.flavor_text:
This Pokémon traveled through time to come
from the future. It bolsters grass and trees with
its own strength, and it can heal wounds, too.

treecko.name: Treecko
treecko.flavor_text:
Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under
any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon,
it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.

grovyle.name: Grovyle
grovyle.flavor_text:
This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees.
In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing
Grovyle however fast they may be.

sceptile.name: Sceptile
sceptile.flavor_text:
Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be
bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon
raises the trees in a forest with loving care.

torchic.name: Torchic
torchic.flavor_text:
Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame.
Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is
covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

combusken.name: Combusken
combusken.flavor_text:
Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from
its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This
Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.

blaziken.name: Blaziken
blaziken.flavor_text:
Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a
30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches
leave its foes scorched and blackened.

mudkip.name: Mudkip
mudkip.flavor_text:
In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is
faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash
its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.

marshtomp.name: Marshtomp
marshtomp.flavor_text:
Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at
swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious
development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.

swampert.name: Swampert
swampert.flavor_text:
Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the
sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is
approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.

poochyena.name: Poochyena
poochyena.flavor_text:
Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing
feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This
Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its
tail bristle out.

mightyena.name: Mightyena
mightyena.flavor_text:
Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory
of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only
those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.

zigzagoon.name: Zigzagoon
zigzagoon.flavor_text:
Zigzagoon that adapted to regions outside
Galar acquired this appearance. If you’ve lost
something, this Pokémon can likely find it.

linoone.name: Linoone
linoone.flavor_text:
It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws
to bring down prey. Running along winding
paths is not its strong suit.

wurmple.name: Wurmple
wurmple.flavor_text:
Likes sap and is abundant in the wild. Why it evolves into
various different forms is unknown. One cannot tell from a
Wurmple's appearance which form it will take when it evolves.

silcoon.name: Silcoon
silcoon.flavor_text:
Wraps itself in thin strings of silk while it stores energy for
evolution. It can't extend its limbs and its movement is slow,
but its eyes keep a sharp lookout—Silcoon is always on guard.

beautifly.name: Beautifly
beautifly.flavor_text:
A colorful and incredibly beautiful but also greedy Pokémon.
In an effort to keep its favorite food all to itself, it will chase
away Combee as they try to gather nectar.

cascoon.name: Cascoon
cascoon.flavor_text:
The silk coating its body is thin but sufficiently strong. Cascoon's
silk has a luster and texture superior to that of Silcoon's, and
clothes made using Cascoon silk are regarded as top-notch.

dustox.name: Dustox
dustox.flavor_text:
Tends to be drawn to bonfires on dark nights. Difficult to chase
away from settlements because of the way it scatters highly
toxic scales.

lotad.name: Lotad
lotad.flavor_text:
Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land.
That is how it began to live floating in the water.

lombre.name: Lombre
lombre.flavor_text:
It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny.
It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and
becomes active at night.

ludicolo.name: Ludicolo
ludicolo.flavor_text:
If it hears festive music, it begins moving in
rhythm in order to amplify its power.

seedot.name: Seedot
seedot.flavor_text:
It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of
its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.

nuzleaf.name: Nuzleaf
nuzleaf.flavor_text:
They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound
of Nuzleaf’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.

shiftry.name: Shiftry
shiftry.flavor_text:
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to
create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.

taillow.name: Taillow
taillow.flavor_text:
Taillow is young—it has only just left its nest. As a result,
it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night.
This Pokémon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.

swellow.name: Swellow
swellow.flavor_text:
Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy
wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take
care of cleaning each other’s wings.

wingull.name: Wingull
wingull.flavor_text:
It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings.
It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the sea’s edge.

pelipper.name: Pelipper
pelipper.flavor_text:
Skimming the water’s surface, it dips its large bill
in the sea, scoops up food and water, and
carries it.

ralts.name: Ralts
ralts.flavor_text:
Tends to prefer people with a chipper disposition to those who
are gloomy, but it has shown no discrimination with regard to
age or gender. Needs more research.

kirlia.name: Kirlia
kirlia.flavor_text:
It resembles a maiden in appearance, but it wields strange
powers to project visions of paradise. I suspect the crimson
ornaments on its head are the key to its abilities.

gardevoir.name: Gardevoir
gardevoir.flavor_text:
It will dedicate itself to defending a master it has come to
adore. Its pure white dress, reminiscent of those worn by ladies
of nobility, is the dress of one who is willing to risk their life.

surskit.name: Surskit
surskit.flavor_text:
It lives in ponds and marshes that feature lots
of plant life. It often fights with Dewpider,
whose habitat and diet are similar.

masquerain.name: Masquerain
masquerain.flavor_text:
Its thin, winglike antennae are highly absorbent.
It waits out rainy days in tree hollows.

shroomish.name: Shroomish
shroomish.flavor_text:
If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters
spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon’s spores are
so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.

breloom.name: Breloom
breloom.flavor_text:
The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic
spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this
Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.

slakoth.name: Slakoth
slakoth.flavor_text:
Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens,
it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this
Pokémon in motion.

vigoroth.name: Vigoroth
vigoroth.flavor_text:
Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it
tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling
this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can
settle down.

slaking.name: Slaking
slaking.flavor_text:
Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear
in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all
the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.

nincada.name: Nincada
nincada.flavor_text:
It can sometimes live underground for more than
10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots
of trees.

ninjask.name: Ninjask
ninjask.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to
avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.

shedinja.name: Shedinja
shedinja.flavor_text:
A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its
wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does
not breathe.

whismur.name: Whismur
whismur.flavor_text:
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice
startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder.
It cries until it’s exhausted, then it falls asleep.

loudred.name: Loudred
loudred.flavor_text:
The force of this Pokémon’s loud voice isn’t just
the sound—it’s also the wave of air pressure that
blows opponents away and damages them.

exploud.name: Exploud
exploud.flavor_text:
This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To
communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all
sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.

makuhita.name: Makuhita
makuhita.flavor_text:
There’s a rumor of a traditional recipe for stew
that Trainers can use to raise strong Makuhita.

hariyama.name: Hariyama
hariyama.flavor_text:
Hariyama that are big and fat aren’t necessarily
strong. There are some small ones that move
nimbly and use moves skillfully.

azurill.name: Azurill
azurill.flavor_text:
Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry
one will swing around the big ball on its tail and
try to smash its opponents.

nosepass.name: Nosepass
nosepass.flavor_text:
Once the people of Hisui discovered that its red nose always
points north, they grew to rely on it greatly when traveling afar.
The nose seems to work in a similar way to ancient compasses.

skitty.name: Skitty
skitty.flavor_text:
Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail.
In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests.
It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

delcatty.name: Delcatty
delcatty.flavor_text:
Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent
nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon
will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.

sableye.name: Sableye
sableye.flavor_text:
It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its
eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.

mawile.name: Mawile
mawile.flavor_text:
It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are
actually steel horns that have been transformed.

aron.name: Aron
aron.flavor_text:
When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In
ancient times, people would collect Aron’s shed
armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.

lairon.name: Lairon
lairon.flavor_text:
During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by
slamming into each other. Close inspection of
their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.

aggron.name: Aggron
aggron.flavor_text:
Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet
meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He
was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.

meditite.name: Meditite
meditite.flavor_text:
Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation.
It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another
aspect of this Pokémon’s training.

medicham.name: Medicham
medicham.flavor_text:
Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its
sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers.
This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month
without eating.

electrike.name: Electrike
electrike.flavor_text:
It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks
from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.

manectric.name: Manectric
manectric.flavor_text:
It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest
where lightning has fallen.

plusle.name: Plusle
plusle.flavor_text:
When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric
sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon
cries loudly.

minun.name: Minun

volbeat.name: Volbeat
volbeat.flavor_text:
Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat,
it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky.
This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

illumise.name: Illumise
illumise.flavor_text:
Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in
the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect
from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

roselia.name: Roselia
roselia.flavor_text:
Though beautiful, it has highly poisonous thorns. There is an old
tradition in my homeland wherein one would send these thorns
to an opponent to challenge them to a duel.

gulpin.name: Gulpin
gulpin.flavor_text:
Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and
brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach
contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.

swalot.name: Swalot
swalot.flavor_text:
Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no
matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile
tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.

carvanha.name: Carvanha
carvanha.flavor_text:
These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful
jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.

sharpedo.name: Sharpedo
sharpedo.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea.
Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls
home will be attacked—no exceptions.

wailmer.name: Wailmer
wailmer.flavor_text:
When it sucks in a large volume of seawater,
it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton
of food daily.

wailord.name: Wailord
wailord.flavor_text:
Its immense size is the reason for its popularity.
Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing
activity in various parts of the world.

numel.name: Numel
numel.flavor_text:
Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit
within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens.
In that event, the Pokémon’s body grows heavy and its
movements become sluggish.

camerupt.name: Camerupt
camerupt.flavor_text:
The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation
of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma.
This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

torkoal.name: Torkoal
torkoal.flavor_text:
You find abandoned coal mines full of them.
They dig tirelessly in search of coal.

spoink.name: Spoink
spoink.flavor_text:
Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to
amplify this Pokémon’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on
a constant search for a bigger pearl.

grumpig.name: Grumpig
grumpig.flavor_text:
Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield
its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely.
This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.

spinda.name: Spinda
spinda.flavor_text:
Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its
stumbling movements, it evades opponents’
attacks brilliantly!

trapinch.name: Trapinch
trapinch.flavor_text:
It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in
wait at the bottom for prey to come
tumbling down.

vibrava.name: Vibrava
vibrava.flavor_text:
To help make its wings grow, it dissolves
quantities of prey in its digestive juices and
guzzles them down every day.

flygon.name: Flygon
flygon.flavor_text:
It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the
flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.

cacnea.name: Cacnea
cacnea.flavor_text:
The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and
fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by
wildly swinging its thorny arms.

cacturne.name: Cacturne
cacturne.flavor_text:
If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night,
Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are
biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become
incapable of moving.

swablu.name: Swablu
swablu.flavor_text:
Since Swablu looks like a cumulus cloud, foes can
have a hard time finding it. Apparently its wings
turned white over many generations.

altaria.name: Altaria
altaria.flavor_text:
This Pokémon has a kind disposition, but if it’s
provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill
cries before attacking them without mercy.

zangoose.name: Zangoose
zangoose.flavor_text:
Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets
up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares
a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.

seviper.name: Seviper
seviper.flavor_text:
Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes
and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will not
give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.

lunatone.name: Lunatone
lunatone.flavor_text:
It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike
40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

solrock.name: Solrock
solrock.flavor_text:
Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is
strong during the daytime. When it spins, its
body shines.

barboach.name: Barboach
barboach.flavor_text:
Makes its home in swamps with murky water. The poor visibility
hides this Pokémon from predators, and the slime on its body
makes grasping it difficult.

whiscash.name: Whiscash
whiscash.flavor_text:
Strikes its caudal fin against the swamp bed to shake the ground
and startle its prey. It will then swallow the fleeing prey whole.
People mistook this behavior as the cause of earthquakes.

corphish.name: Corphish
corphish.flavor_text:
It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped
to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.

crawdaunt.name: Crawdaunt
crawdaunt.flavor_text:
A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will
crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.

baltoy.name: Baltoy
baltoy.flavor_text:
It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving,
it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even
when asleep.

claydol.name: Claydol
claydol.flavor_text:
It appears to have been born from clay dolls
made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to
float and move.

lileep.name: Lileep
lileep.flavor_text:
Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey
comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with
petallike tentacles.

cradily.name: Cradily
cradily.flavor_text:
Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles,
it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.

anorith.name: Anorith
anorith.flavor_text:
Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings
through the water like oars on a boat. This
Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.

armaldo.name: Armaldo
armaldo.flavor_text:
Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer.
It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its
sharp claws to take down its quarry.

feebas.name: Feebas
feebas.flavor_text:
It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is
very hardy and can survive on little water.

milotic.name: Milotic
milotic.flavor_text:
It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty
will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.

castform.name: Castform
castform.flavor_text:
Its form changes depending on the weather.
The rougher conditions get, the rougher
Castform’s disposition!

kecleon.name: Kecleon
kecleon.flavor_text:
Its color changes for concealment and also
when its mood or health changes. The darker
the color, the healthier it is.

shuppet.name: Shuppet
shuppet.flavor_text:
There’s a proverb that says, “Shun the house
where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.”

banette.name: Banette
banette.flavor_text:
Resentment at being cast off made it spring into
being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy
it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.

duskull.name: Duskull
duskull.flavor_text:
I've heard that the children of Hisui all begin to behave once
they've been told the story of how this Pokémon roams about
before the witching hour to spirit away misbehaving children.

dusclops.name: Dusclops
dusclops.flavor_text:
There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body
will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the
bandages, never to return. I've been too scared to verify.

tropius.name: Tropius
tropius.flavor_text:
Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck.
In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.

chimecho.name: Chimecho
chimecho.flavor_text:
Can emit waves of air powerful enough to knock out prey taller
than itself. I hypothesize that it amplifies the faint sound of wind
within its body.

absol.name: Absol
absol.flavor_text:
Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect
danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer
of doom.

wynaut.name: Wynaut
wynaut.flavor_text:
It tends to move in a pack with others.
They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

snorunt.name: Snorunt
snorunt.flavor_text:
Arrives alongside the first snow. It's thought that homes Snorunt
visit will prosper for many generations. By tradition, one might
offer a lump of ice made from pure water at one's front door.

glalie.name: Glalie
glalie.flavor_text:
It covers its body with an armor of ice harder than steel. Uses its
breath to freeze prey, which it then devours as if they were
frozen desserts.

spheal.name: Spheal
spheal.flavor_text:
During the season when drift ice approaches the shore, Spheal
prefers living on the ice—where fewer predators lurk—rather
than the land. Its fur retains heat superbly and resists harsh cold.

sealeo.name: Sealeo
sealeo.flavor_text:
Its white whiskers are very sensitive. Sealeo will balance Spheal
on the tip of its nose, checking its scent and its feel to be sure
the Spheal is healthy.

walrein.name: Walrein
walrein.flavor_text:
Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have
been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year.
The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.

clamperl.name: Clamperl
clamperl.flavor_text:
Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious.
They can be more than 10 times as costly
as Shellder’s pearls.

huntail.name: Huntail
huntail.flavor_text:
Deep seas are their habitat. According to
tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore,
something unfortunate will happen.

gorebyss.name: Gorebyss
gorebyss.flavor_text:
It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The
leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it
becomes food for other Pokémon.

relicanth.name: Relicanth
relicanth.flavor_text:
This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea
exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in
100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.

luvdisc.name: Luvdisc
luvdisc.flavor_text:
Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm
seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space
between Corsola’s branches.

bagon.name: Bagon
bagon.flavor_text:
Bagon is a solitary Pokémon that doesn’t form
groups with others of its kind. It also has a head
hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.

shelgon.name: Shelgon
shelgon.flavor_text:
Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating
any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once
all its energy stores are used up.

salamence.name: Salamence
salamence.flavor_text:
While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps
this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into
an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.

beldum.name: Beldum
beldum.flavor_text:
The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed
of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic
forces flow through Beldum’s body.

metang.name: Metang
metang.flavor_text:
Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon
flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh
mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.

metagross.name: Metagross
metagross.flavor_text:
Metagross is the result of the fusion of two
Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents
through use of its supercomputer-level brain.

regirock.name: Regirock
regirock.flavor_text:
Cutting-edge technology was used to study
the internals of this Pokémon’s rock body, but
nothing was found—not even a brain or a heart.

regice.name: Regice
regice.flavor_text:
This Pokémon’s body is made of solid ice. It’s
said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in
the ice age.

registeel.name: Registeel
registeel.flavor_text:
It’s rumored that this Pokémon was born deep
underground in the planet’s mantle and that it
emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.

latias.name: Latias
latias.flavor_text:
Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding
human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down.
The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts
light to alter its appearance.

latios.name: Latios
latios.flavor_text:
Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a
compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a
jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

kyogre.name: Kyogre
kyogre.flavor_text:
Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself.
Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon,
as each sought to gain the power of nature.

groudon.name: Groudon
groudon.flavor_text:
Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power,
it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to
erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

rayquaza.name: Rayquaza
rayquaza.flavor_text:
It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming
meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids
in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

jirachi.name: Jirachi
jirachi.flavor_text:
It’s believed that when this Pokémon wakes from
its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes
written on the notes attached to its head.

deoxys.name: Deoxys
deoxys.flavor_text:
Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly
intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon
shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

turtwig.name: Turtwig
turtwig.flavor_text:
This Pokémon becomes more energetic the more sunlight there
is. The part resembling a shell is similar to silt and is slightly
damp and warm to the touch.

grotle.name: Grotle
grotle.flavor_text:
Appears where there is clean spring water. The fruit that grows
on the shrubs on its shell is sweet, nutritious, and truly delicious.

torterra.name: Torterra
torterra.flavor_text:
This remarkable, large-bodied Pokémon would serve beautifully
as borrowed scenery for a garden, and its strength is peerless.
Torterra roams the wilderness in search of clean water.

chimchar.name: Chimchar
chimchar.flavor_text:
Full of vigor and always in high spirits. It was once known by the
name ”Lantern-Tail” and feared as some kind of apparition.

monferno.name: Monferno
monferno.flavor_text:
The deeper the blue on its face, the more powerful it will grow
to become. It leaps about every which way and lands powerful
blows against its opponents with the flame on its tail.

infernape.name: Infernape
infernape.flavor_text:
A tall, hardy Pokémon with a dazzling appearance. It shrouds
itself in flame and battles as if engaged in dance—truly a sight
to behold.

piplup.name: Piplup
piplup.flavor_text:
Prefers cold climes and appears along coasts. It's an adorable
little thing—as cute as any child—but it's also prideful, unwilling
to accept handouts from people.

prinplup.name: Prinplup
prinplup.flavor_text:
It swims gracefully through the frigid sea and sings with a voice
like the roaring tide. It has powerful, sturdy wings and dignity
to match.

empoleon.name: Empoleon
empoleon.flavor_text:
Since ancient times, it has been revered by the people of Hisui,
who call it the Master of the Waves. Its wings are a match for
even master-crafted blades.

starly.name: Starly
starly.flavor_text:
They live in the fields and mountains, gathering in large flocks.
Their cries are quite obnoxious. Though small, their wings are
strong—a strike from them leaves pain that persists for a week.

staravia.name: Staravia
staravia.flavor_text:
They form remarkably large flocks and are constantly fighting
amongst themselves. I suspect that those with magnificent
plumes on their heads are the strong ones.

staraptor.name: Staraptor
staraptor.flavor_text:
It has left the flock, having gained strength enough to survive on
its own. The astounding force with which Staraptor flies through
the air allows it to carry away large, burly targets.

bidoof.name: Bidoof
bidoof.flavor_text:
Bidoof has an unsophisticated face and is rarely flustered by
anything. There have been incidents involving Bidoof sauntering
into villages and gnawing on the houses without a single care.

bibarel.name: Bibarel
bibarel.flavor_text:
Bibarel fur repels water and is also a fantastic material for heat
retention. These Pokémon create dams on rivers to live in.

kricketot.name: Kricketot
kricketot.flavor_text:
When the trees take on new hues, more of these Pokémon
appear. The tone they create by striking their antennae together
resembles that of the marimba, an instrument of foreign lands.

kricketune.name: Kricketune
kricketune.flavor_text:
It uses its cutlass-like arms to produce sound, the melody of
which varies from individual to individual. It is a worthwhile
endeavor to seek out one's favorite tunes.

shinx.name: Shinx
shinx.flavor_text:
Shakes its body to generate electricity. Its stature belies its
aggression—one must be patient to tame this Pokémon.

luxio.name: Luxio
luxio.flavor_text:
Proudly uses its electrified claws as weapons. It seems to be a
gracious Pokémon, evenly sharing the spoils of the hunt with
others of its kind.

luxray.name: Luxray
luxray.flavor_text:
They form packs, each having one male as leader. Legends say
that when Luxray's two eyes shimmer with gold, the Pokémon
can see through anything.

budew.name: Budew
budew.flavor_text:
When the sun's light strengthens, the bud atop this Pokémon's
head opens. This is a sign to the people that the harsh winter is
over, and the season of budding has begun.

roserade.name: Roserade
roserade.flavor_text:
Hidden within the bouquet on each hand are thorned whips
loaded with virulent poison. Roserade moves gracefully as it
corners its prey and mercilessly lashes them with its whips.

cranidos.name: Cranidos
cranidos.flavor_text:
An incredibly rare sight. They duel each other by ramming their
heads together, and the resulting sound echoes throughout the
area like the pealing of a bell.

rampardos.name: Rampardos
rampardos.flavor_text:
Very little is known about its biology. Can knock down massive
trees by smashing its beautiful, pearl-like crown against them.

shieldon.name: Shieldon
shieldon.flavor_text:
Much remains unknown about this Pokémon, as few have ever
seen it. However, we know that it is calm and dislikes conflict,
and it enjoys polishing its face against trees and rocks.

bastiodon.name: Bastiodon
bastiodon.flavor_text:
Its face is sturdy—as strong as diamond—and this hardness
offers a very stable defense. Much about this species is still
unknown, such as its natural habitat.

burmy.name: Burmy
burmy.flavor_text:
If its cloak is even slightly damaged, Burmy will immediately
repair it with whatever is close at hand. The Pokémon within the
cloak is scrawny and vulnerable to the cold.

wormadam.name: Wormadam
wormadam.flavor_text:
When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of
this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

mothim.name: Mothim
mothim.flavor_text:
Scatters steel-colored scales as it flaps its wings. Despite
being observed feeding primarily on the nectar of flowers,
Mothim is not often seen around flower gardens.

combee.name: Combee
combee.flavor_text:
They swear fealty to a queen Pokémon and work diligently to
gather nectar. Each swarm produces a different flavor of honey.

vespiquen.name: Vespiquen
vespiquen.flavor_text:
Commands its subjects to build its hive. It will dispatch any
interlopers who dare sneak into its nest and use them as
nourishment for itself.

pachirisu.name: Pachirisu
pachirisu.flavor_text:
A species related to the Pikachu line. Though Pachirisu is a calm
Pokémon, it still presents a danger should one touch its
electrified tail or cheeks.

buizel.name: Buizel
buizel.flavor_text:
It moves freely in the water by spinning its forked tail for
propulsion. The resemblance to the screw of a steamboat
is coincidental.

floatzel.name: Floatzel
floatzel.flavor_text:
Has a long, rather splendid flotation sac, which prevents
Floatzel from drowning even in stormy seas. One might glimpse
this species around fishing hamlets from time to time.

cherubi.name: Cherubi
cherubi.flavor_text:
Once the fruit growing alongside the main body is large and
plump, Cherubi will use the nutrients within to evolve. The fruit
then detaches, becoming nourishment for other creatures.

cherrim.name: Cherrim
cherrim.flavor_text:
Motionless, save for the occasional quiver. A rich array of
Pokémon can be found gathered around it, drawn by the
scent exuded from Cherrim's folded petals.

shellos.name: Shellos
shellos.flavor_text:
Found in abundance on seashores bordering warm waters.
Shellos are unexpectedly friendly and will crawl toward any
person they see. Take care not to get coated in mucus!

gastrodon.name: Gastrodon
gastrodon.flavor_text:
Eats beach sand for nourishment. Should one Gastrodon
encounter another of a different color, a fierce battle will inevitably ensue.

ambipom.name: Ambipom
ambipom.flavor_text:
To affirm their kinship, members of this species will form a ring
by linking their newly doubled tails together. On rare occasions,
humans have been accepted into such rings.

drifloon.name: Drifloon
drifloon.flavor_text:
Said to lure away young children and carry them off to the
afterlife. Some whisper that Drifloon are formed of reincarnated
human souls, but these rumors are as yet unconfirmed.

drifblim.name: Drifblim
drifblim.flavor_text:
It drifts along at dusk, perfectly silent. Its transient, melancholy
aspect touches some people deeply—every so often, one will
come upon a song or poem devoted to Drifblim.

buneary.name: Buneary
buneary.flavor_text:
My hypothesis as to why Buneary rolls up its ears is that its
hearing is far too keen. I surmise that the Pokémon protects its
hearing by limiting the sound that may enter its ears.

lopunny.name: Lopunny
lopunny.flavor_text:
Its fur is warm and yet remarkably light. This Pokémon kicks as
though it were a master of karate, driving back its opponents
with ease.

mismagius.name: Mismagius
mismagius.flavor_text:
The incantations Mismagius chants can ward against misfortune,
so a custom exists of inviting it into one's home. Incur the
Pokémon's displeasure, however, and disaster will surely ensue.

honchkrow.name: Honchkrow
honchkrow.flavor_text:
One cry from this Pokémon, and a murder of Murkrow come
flying. At such times, one would think the curtain of night had
fallen, plunging the world into jet-black darkness.

glameow.name: Glameow
glameow.flavor_text:
Bewitches humans with its helical tail and piercing gaze.
Its hidden claws are quite sharp as well, making this Pokémon
an exceedingly tricky opponent if antagonized.

purugly.name: Purugly
purugly.flavor_text:
Though impudent and difficult to tame, Purugly enjoys great
popularity due to its fur, the beauty of which surpasses
even velveteen.

chingling.name: Chingling
chingling.flavor_text:
This Pokémon gave me an excruciating headache when it
