seemingly cried out without making a sound. Perhaps there are
some sounds that the human ear is simply incapable of hearing.

stunky.name: Stunky
stunky.flavor_text:
The poison that gushes from its aft end is accompanied by an
utterly evil-smelling odor with such potency that one whiff can
induce memory loss.

skuntank.name: Skuntank
skuntank.flavor_text:
Sprays a poisonous fluid to take down prey. Sometimes, unable
to stomach the stench of its own fluid, it leaves the bested
prey uneaten.

bronzor.name: Bronzor
bronzor.flavor_text:
Floats using a mysterious energy. The pattern engraved upon its
back is held as sacred and can sometimes be found in imagery
from ancient cemeteries and other such timeworn places.

bronzong.name: Bronzong
bronzong.flavor_text:
Some believe that its bell-like cry opens holes to another world.
It has been revered as a deity since ancient times.

bonsly.name: Bonsly
bonsly.flavor_text:
Its tears elicit sympathy from those who see them, but do
not be deceived! This expulsion of body water is merely a
physiological mechanism for keeping itself in good health.

mime-jr.name: Mime Jr.
mime-jr.flavor_text:
Known to turn up in bustling marketplaces now and again.
It mimics people much as a child would, then watches how they
react, eyes sparkling.

happiny.name: Happiny
happiny.flavor_text:
In imitation of Chansey, it keeps a round stone tucked into its
belly pouch and cherishes it dearly. It gets along well with
children and will sometimes play house with them for fun.

chatot.name: Chatot
chatot.flavor_text:
A versatile performer skilled in the imitation of human speech.
It is said that older, more experienced Chatot can even
understand the meaning of the words they mimic.

spiritomb.name: Spiritomb
spiritomb.flavor_text:
It lays curses by thinking wicked thoughts. Writings tell that this
Pokémon was born out of the assembly of five score and eight
malevolent spirits.

gible.name: Gible
gible.flavor_text:
It nests in caves untouched by sunlight. Its sharp teeth may fall
out when worn away or after an impact, but they regrow within
a few days.

gabite.name: Gabite
gabite.flavor_text:
Though Gabite are usually of a violent disposition, when I gave
one a glass bead it had been eyeing covetously, it suddenly
became quite docile.

garchomp.name: Garchomp
garchomp.flavor_text:
Soars across the heavens at blinding speed—a magnificent sight!
It has a feral disposition. Utmost caution is required if one
meets a Garchomp out in the wilds.

munchlax.name: Munchlax
munchlax.flavor_text:
Its robust stomach allows it to nonchalantly devour even rotted
matter. It pays frequent visits to villages, seeking out food
scraps intended for compost.

riolu.name: Riolu
riolu.flavor_text:
Though infantile in appearance, it has the mysterious ability to
read the minds of humans. The pure of heart are met with
Riolu's approval, while those of ill nature earn only its loathing.

lucario.name: Lucario
lucario.flavor_text:
A most gallant-looking creature. It emits energy waves and
controls them with precision, using them to sense even faraway
beings. I have given the name ”aura” to this power.

hippopotas.name: Hippopotas
hippopotas.flavor_text:
Though large and languid, Hippopotas is difficult to detect
due to its tendency to burrow into and lurk beneath the soil.
When agitated or excited, it expels sand from its nostrils.

hippowdon.name: Hippowdon
hippowdon.flavor_text:
Short-tempered and easily moved to violence. It whips up
whirlwinds of sand to crush its foes' spirits, then goes in for
the attack.

skorupi.name: Skorupi
skorupi.flavor_text:
Its claws are not only razor-sharp but poisonous, making Skorupi
a highly dangerous Pokémon. It seems to be weakened by cold
temperatures, however.

drapion.name: Drapion
drapion.flavor_text:
Has a brutish, ferocious temperament. With immense strength
and a sturdy shell off which swords will bounce, it rampages
about and wreaks havoc.

croagunk.name: Croagunk
croagunk.flavor_text:
A poison wielder with a dastardly personality. Despite such
qualities, this species is afforded a measure of popularity due
to its peculiar cry and comical features.

toxicroak.name: Toxicroak
toxicroak.flavor_text:
Its crimson claws contain a virulent toxin. This toxin can be made
into a tonic by diluting it, mixing it with several types of wild
grass, and boiling it down over two days.

carnivine.name: Carnivine
carnivine.flavor_text:
Though this is a plant Pokémon, it has a gluttonous and unruly
temperament. Carnivine attacks its prey with its cavernous maw
wide open.

finneon.name: Finneon
finneon.flavor_text:
What a gorgeous sight this Pokémon is as it swims with its long,
pink-painted caudal fins fluttering behind it. Finneon's beautiful
appearance has led to its nickname: ”finery fish.”

lumineon.name: Lumineon
lumineon.flavor_text:
Uses its gleaming fins to hunt its prey. The view of Lumineon
schooling near the surface of the sea at night is breathtaking—
it's as though there were shining stars right there.

mantyke.name: Mantyke
mantyke.flavor_text:
Though ball-like in shape, this Pokémon is a proficient swimmer.
I have discovered that if a Mantyke spends much time with
schools of Remoraid, it will eventually achieve evolution.

snover.name: Snover
snover.flavor_text:
One is likely to encounter this Pokémon while out in the snow.
There are stories of Snover appearing in human settlements but
doing no harm—rather, they bond with the children.

abomasnow.name: Abomasnow
abomasnow.flavor_text:
A powerful Pokémon that can split huge boulders with ease.
Dislikes associating with others and chooses to live quietly deep
within the mountains, playing with the snow.

weavile.name: Weavile
weavile.flavor_text:
This species corners prey as a pack, under the guidance of
a leader. Weavile displays increased cunning, leading me to
speculate that its evolution caused further brain development.

magnezone.name: Magnezone
magnezone.flavor_text:
I theorize that a special magnetic field influenced this Pokémon,
changing its molecular structure and causing it to evolve. It emits
strange radio waves toward space from its antenna.

lickilicky.name: Lickilicky
lickilicky.flavor_text:
Its tongue can extend and contract freely, and it is capable of
reaching lengths over 10 times Lickilicky's height. Beware of the
saliva, as it contains corrosive elements.

rhyperior.name: Rhyperior
rhyperior.flavor_text:
This Pokémon evolved through use of a curious item. Its rocklike
hide is composed of a mysterious substance and can withstand a
blow from a masterwork sword with nary a scratch.

tangrowth.name: Tangrowth
tangrowth.flavor_text:
Draped with long vines, it resembles a shrub in appearance.
It swings bundles of vines as though they were arms, wrapping
them around prey to ensnare them.

electivire.name: Electivire
electivire.flavor_text:
Its evolution was induced by an unusual item, and its electrical
output rises along with its heart rate. From its tails, it can
unleash an electric current measuring 20,000 volts.

magmortar.name: Magmortar
magmortar.flavor_text:
Use of a strange item caused this Pokémon to evolve. Fireballs
launched from the ends of its tubelike arms are hot enough to
melt an iron pot in an instant.

togekiss.name: Togekiss
togekiss.flavor_text:
Scant few have ever sighted this Pokémon. After studying what
literature remains, I am certain Togekiss will reveal itself when
peace reigns in the land.

yanmega.name: Yanmega
yanmega.flavor_text:
Extremely violent. When hunting, it wastes none of its energy,
aiming only for prey's most vulnerable spots. Any who manage
to tame this Pokémon must be of incredible bravery.

leafeon.name: Leafeon
leafeon.flavor_text:
Cells similar to those of plants have been found in its fur.
Its hard tail can fell a large tree with one stroke, and the tail's
sharpness exceeds even that of a sword crafted by a master.

glaceon.name: Glaceon
glaceon.flavor_text:
Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly.
It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters
like gems while it flutters and dances around.

gliscor.name: Gliscor
gliscor.flavor_text:
It glides soundlessly on pitch-black wings and sinks sharp fangs
into the throat of its prey. It takes on a look of satisfaction once
it has entirely drained its prey of blood.

mamoswine.name: Mamoswine
mamoswine.flavor_text:
This species reached its zenith during the period known as the
ice age. I suspect that Hisui's frigid climate is in harmony with
Mamoswine's constitution, thus awakening hidden potential.

porygon-z.name: Porygon-Z
porygon-z.flavor_text:
A curious item induced this evolution. The Pokémon's offensive
capabilities have greatly increased, but the strangeness of its
behavior has magnified in equal measure. This worries me.

gallade.name: Gallade
gallade.flavor_text:
The blades extending from its elbows are sharper than the
finest swords. Its swordsmanship, albeit self-taught, is
astonishingly impressive.

probopass.name: Probopass
probopass.flavor_text:
It is able to emit powerful magnetism, allowing it control over
the iron sand that forms its luscious mustache. Using this iron
sand, Probopass forms hard stones with which it smites its prey.

dusknoir.name: Dusknoir
dusknoir.flavor_text:
Comes to those whose lives have come to an end and escorts
their souls to the afterlife. Known to mistakenly take the souls of
those who yet have life left in them, albeit rarely.

froslass.name: Froslass
froslass.flavor_text:
A Pokémon inhabited by the soul of a woman who died bearing
a grudge in the snowy mountains. Legends of Froslass placing
deathly curses on misbehaving men send shivers down my spine.

rotom.name: Rotom
rotom.flavor_text:
This bizarre Pokémon appears to be a will-o'-the-wisp powered
by electricity. Be wary, as Rotom is both smart and mischievous.

uxie.name: Uxie
uxie.flavor_text:
A Pokémon feared but also respected for stealing away the
memories of evildoers. I have found records that suggest Uxie
holds dominion over knowledge.

mesprit.name: Mesprit
mesprit.flavor_text:
Known as the Being of Emotion. In legend, this Pokémon was
feared, as any who showed disrespect would have their
emotions thrown into disarray.

azelf.name: Azelf
azelf.flavor_text:
The dreaded Being of Willpower. Legends tell of this Pokémon
manipulating the will of its adversaries and turning them into
puppets of its own.

dialga.name: Dialga
dialga.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is revered as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth
of Dialga was what caused the vast river of time to begin
flowing in our world.

palkia.name: Palkia
palkia.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is feared as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth
of Palkia was what caused the walls of our world to disappear,
creating a sky that spans for infinity.

heatran.name: Heatran
heatran.flavor_text:
Stories tell of this Pokémon being birthed from the boiling
magma within Mount Coronet. Its molten-steel body holds
many mysteries.

regigigas.name: Regigigas
regigigas.flavor_text:
According to legend, Regigigas pulled landmasses together and
bound them with rope to create the continent of Hisui. Though I
have my doubts, the story could well contain a shred of truth.

giratina.name: Giratina
giratina.flavor_text:
There is one Hisuian verse that tells of a powerful light creating
a deep shadow. I imagine that this deep shadow is Giratina.

cresselia.name: Cresselia
cresselia.flavor_text:
Cresselia is reminiscent of the crescent moon. It leaves a brilliant
line of light in its wake as it flies across the night sky. I daresay
it resembles the heavenly maiden who created the Milky Way.

phione.name: Phione
phione.flavor_text:
Can be seen floating offshore during seasons when the seas are
warm. Its azure body blends in with the ocean waters—logic
suggests this is a defense mechanism against natural predators.

manaphy.name: Manaphy
manaphy.flavor_text:
Rumored to migrate across the oceans and visit Hisui's coastal
waters only rarely. Although Manaphy resembles Phione, it is
also quite different. The relation between the two is unclear.

darkrai.name: Darkrai
darkrai.flavor_text:
On a moonless night, a strange incident occurred in which every
one of a village's inhabitants suffered nightmares. The villagers
attested that Darkrai appeared before them in these nightmares.

shaymin.name: Shaymin
shaymin.flavor_text:
When the turning of seasons brings the cruel winter to its end
and the joyous people give thanks to the heavens, Shaymin
appears and covers the withered land with flowers.

arceus.name: Arceus
arceus.flavor_text:
It is the heavenly fount from which pours the light that shines
across Hisui. Its luminance guides and protects all Pokémon.
Hisuian mythology states that Arceus is the creator of all things.

victini.name: Victini
victini.flavor_text:
When it shares the infinite energy it creates,
that being’s entire body will be overflowing
with power.

snivy.name: Snivy
snivy.flavor_text:
They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in
sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their
tails droop.

servine.name: Servine
servine.flavor_text:
When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in
photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

serperior.name: Serperior
serperior.flavor_text:
It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a
glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts
it internally.

tepig.name: Tepig
tepig.flavor_text:
It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it
gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

pignite.name: Pignite
pignite.flavor_text:
When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow
sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

emboar.name: Emboar
emboar.flavor_text:
It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves.
It grows a beard of fire.

oshawott.name: Oshawott
oshawott.flavor_text:
This Pokémon from the Unova region uses the shell on its belly
as a weapon to cut down its foes. Thus, I've conferred upon this
shell the name ”scalchop”.

dewott.name: Dewott
dewott.flavor_text:
Its exquisite double-scalchop technique is likely the result of
daily training, and it can send even masters of the blade fleeing
in defeat.

samurott.name: Samurott
samurott.flavor_text:
Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is
a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its
turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.

patrat.name: Patrat
patrat.flavor_text:
Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on
the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming
from behind.

watchog.name: Watchog
watchog.flavor_text:
When they see an enemy, their tails stand high,
and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their
cheek pouches.

lillipup.name: Lillipup
lillipup.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is far brighter than the average
child, and Lillipup won’t forget the love it
receives or any abuse it suffers.

herdier.name: Herdier
herdier.flavor_text:
The black fur that covers this Pokémon’s body
is dense and springy. Even sharp fangs bounce
right off.

stoutland.name: Stoutland
stoutland.flavor_text:
Stoutland is immensely proud of its impressive
moustache. It’s said that moustache length is what
determines social standing among this species.

purrloin.name: Purrloin
purrloin.flavor_text:
Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable
behavior come away with stinging scratches from
its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.

liepard.name: Liepard
liepard.flavor_text:
This stealthy Pokémon sneaks up behind prey
without making any sound at all. It competes with
Thievul for territory.

pansage.name: Pansage
pansage.flavor_text:
It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from
all over. It’s kind enough to share them
with friends.

simisage.name: Simisage
simisage.flavor_text:
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail
around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is
very bitter.

pansear.name: Pansear
pansear.flavor_text:
This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes.
The fire within the tuft on its head can reach
600 degrees Fahrenheit.

simisear.name: Simisear
simisear.flavor_text:
When it gets excited, embers rise from its head
and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it
loves sweets.

panpour.name: Panpour
panpour.flavor_text:
The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of
nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

simipour.name: Simipour
simipour.flavor_text:
It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs
low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with
its tail.

munna.name: Munna
munna.flavor_text:
It eats dreams and releases mist. The mist is pink
when it’s eating a good dream, and black when
it’s eating a nightmare.

musharna.name: Musharna
musharna.flavor_text:
It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to
leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible
grump when freshly roused from sleep.

pidove.name: Pidove
pidove.flavor_text:
It’s forgetful and not very bright, but many
Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness
and sincerity.

tranquill.name: Tranquill
tranquill.flavor_text:
These bright Pokémon have acute memories.
Apparently delivery workers often choose them
as their partners.

unfezant.name: Unfezant
unfezant.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is intelligent and intensely proud.
People will sit up and take notice if you become
the Trainer of one.

blitzle.name: Blitzle
blitzle.flavor_text:
Its mane shines when it discharges electricity.
They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes
to communicate.

zebstrika.name: Zebstrika
zebstrika.flavor_text:
They have lightning-like movements.
When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of
thunder reverberates.

roggenrola.name: Roggenrola
roggenrola.flavor_text:
When it detects a noise, it starts to move.
The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon
slightly warm to the touch.

boldore.name: Boldore
boldore.flavor_text:
It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its
vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever
changing the direction it’s facing.

gigalith.name: Gigalith
gigalith.flavor_text:
Although its energy blasts can blow away
a dump truck, they have a limitation—
they can only be fired when the sun is out.

woobat.name: Woobat
woobat.flavor_text:
It emits ultrasonic waves as it flutters about,
searching for its prey—bug Pokémon.

swoobat.name: Swoobat
swoobat.flavor_text:
The auspicious shape of this Pokémon’s nose
apparently led some regions to consider
Swoobat a symbol of good luck.

drilbur.name: Drilbur
drilbur.flavor_text:
It’s a digger, using its claws to burrow through the
ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so
many farmers have little love for it.

excadrill.name: Excadrill
excadrill.flavor_text:
Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can
tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over
90 mph.

audino.name: Audino
audino.flavor_text:
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with
its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures’
feelings and physical conditions.

timburr.name: Timburr
timburr.flavor_text:
Timburr that have started carrying logs that are
about three times their size are nearly ready
to evolve.

gurdurr.name: Gurdurr
gurdurr.flavor_text:
Gurdurr excels at demolition—construction is not
its forte. In any case, there’s skill in the way this
Pokémon wields its metal beam.

conkeldurr.name: Conkeldurr
conkeldurr.flavor_text:
When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside
its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to
pummel them with its fists.

tympole.name: Tympole
tympole.flavor_text:
It uses sound waves to communicate with
others of its kind. People and other Pokémon
species can’t hear its cries of warning.

palpitoad.name: Palpitoad
palpitoad.flavor_text:
On occasion, their cries are sublimely pleasing to
the ear. Palpitoad with larger lumps on their
bodies can sing with a wider range of sounds.

seismitoad.name: Seismitoad
seismitoad.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is popular among the elderly,
who say the vibrations of its lumps are great
for massages.

throh.name: Throh
throh.flavor_text:
They train in groups of five. Any member that
can’t keep up will discard its belt and leave
the group.

sawk.name: Sawk
sawk.flavor_text:
The karate chops of a Sawk that’s trained itself
to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.

sewaddle.name: Sewaddle
sewaddle.flavor_text:
Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of
leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

swadloon.name: Swadloon
swadloon.flavor_text:
It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in
leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves
in forests.

leavanny.name: Leavanny
leavanny.flavor_text:
It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting
leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings
for Sewaddle.

venipede.name: Venipede
venipede.flavor_text:
Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon
finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them
without any thought of how things might turn out.

whirlipede.name: Whirlipede
whirlipede.flavor_text:
Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and
poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it’ll
need for evolution.

scolipede.name: Scolipede
scolipede.flavor_text:
Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with
Centiskorch. At the end of one of these battles,
the victor makes a meal of the loser.

cottonee.name: Cottonee
cottonee.flavor_text:
Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee
and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that’s
highly prized by many luxury brands.

whimsicott.name: Whimsicott
whimsicott.flavor_text:
As long as this Pokémon bathes in sunlight, its
cotton keeps growing. If too much cotton fluff
builds up, Whimsicott tears it off and scatters it.

petilil.name: Petilil
petilil.flavor_text:
The leaves on its head are highly valued for medicinal purposes.
Dry the leaves in the sun, boil them, and then drink the bitter
decoction for remarkably effective relief from fatigue.

lilligant.name: Lilligant
lilligant.flavor_text:
I suspect that its well-developed legs are the result of a life
spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes
from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.

basculin.name: Basculin
basculin.flavor_text:
Though it differs from other Basculin in several respects,
including demeanor—this one is gentle—I have categorized
it as a regional form given the vast array of shared qualities.

sandile.name: Sandile
sandile.flavor_text:
Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are
powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile
moves through the desert as if it’s swimming.

krokorok.name: Krokorok
krokorok.flavor_text:
Although this Pokémon has specialized eyes that
allow it to see in the dark, Krokorok won’t move
much at night—the desert gets cold after sunset.

krookodile.name: Krookodile
krookodile.flavor_text:
While terribly aggressive, Krookodile also has
the patience to stay hidden under sand for days,
lying in wait for prey.

darumaka.name: Darumaka
darumaka.flavor_text:
This popular symbol of good fortune will never
fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed
or pulled.

darmanitan.name: Darmanitan
darmanitan.flavor_text:
This Pokémon’s power level rises along with the
temperature of its fire, which can reach 2,500
degrees Fahrenheit.

maractus.name: Maractus
maractus.flavor_text:
Once each year, this Pokémon scatters its seeds.
They’re jam-packed with nutrients, making them
a precious food source out in the desert.

dwebble.name: Dwebble
dwebble.flavor_text:
It first tries to find a rock to live in, but if there
are no suitable rocks to be found, Dwebble may
move in to the ports of a Hippowdon.

crustle.name: Crustle
crustle.flavor_text:
Its thick claws are its greatest weapons.
They’re mighty enough to crack
Rhyperior’s carapace.

scraggy.name: Scraggy
scraggy.flavor_text:
It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought
that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has
completely stretched out.

scrafty.name: Scrafty
scrafty.flavor_text:
While mostly known for having the temperament
of an aggressive ruffian, this Pokémon takes very
good care of its family, friends, and territory.

sigilyph.name: Sigilyph
sigilyph.flavor_text:
A discovery was made in the desert where
Sigilyph fly. The ruins of what may have been
an ancient city were found beneath the sands.

yamask.name: Yamask
yamask.flavor_text:
The spirit of a person from a bygone age became
this Pokémon. It rambles through ruins, searching
for someone who knows its face.

cofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus
cofagrigus.flavor_text:
There are many depictions of Cofagrigus
decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols
of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.

tirtouga.name: Tirtouga
tirtouga.flavor_text:
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancestor of
many turtle Pokémon. It was restored to life
from a fossil.

carracosta.name: Carracosta
carracosta.flavor_text:
This Pokémon emerges from the water in search
of prey despite the fact that it moves more
slowly on land.

archen.name: Archen
archen.flavor_text:
Archen is said to be the ancestor of bird
Pokémon. It lived in treetops, eating berries
and bug Pokémon.

archeops.name: Archeops
archeops.flavor_text:
Though capable of flight, Archeops was
apparently better at hunting on the ground.

trubbish.name: Trubbish
trubbish.flavor_text:
This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with
trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched
by Trubbish.

garbodor.name: Garbodor
garbodor.flavor_text:
The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm
is so virulent that it can kill a weakened
creature instantly.

zorua.name: Zorua
zorua.flavor_text:
A once-departed soul, returned to life in Hisui. Derives power
from resentment, which rises as energy atop its head and takes
on the forms of foes. In this way, Zorua vents lingering malice.

zoroark.name: Zoroark
zoroark.flavor_text:
With its disheveled white fur, it looks like an embodiment of
death. Heedless of its own safety, Zoroark attacks its nemeses
with a bitter energy so intense, it lacerates Zoroark's own body.

minccino.name: Minccino
minccino.flavor_text:
They pet each other with their tails as a form of
greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier
is a bit more boastful.

cinccino.name: Cinccino
cinccino.flavor_text:
A special oil that seeps through their fur helps
them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price
at market.

gothita.name: Gothita
gothita.flavor_text:
Even when nobody seems to be around, Gothita
can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe
it’s speaking to something only it can see.

gothorita.name: Gothorita
gothorita.flavor_text:
On nights when the stars shine, this Pokémon’s
psychic power is at its strongest. It’s unknown just
what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.

gothitelle.name: Gothitelle
gothitelle.flavor_text:
A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle
went missing that same day and was never
seen again.

solosis.name: Solosis
solosis.flavor_text:
Many say that the special liquid covering this
Pokémon’s body would allow it to survive in
the vacuum of space.

duosion.name: Duosion
duosion.flavor_text:
Its brain has split into two, and the two
halves rarely think alike. Its actions are
utterly unpredictable.

reuniclus.name: Reuniclus
reuniclus.flavor_text:
It’s said that drinking the liquid surrounding
Reuniclus grants wisdom. Problem is, the liquid is
highly toxic to anything besides Reuniclus itself.

ducklett.name: Ducklett
ducklett.flavor_text:
They are better at swimming than flying, and they
happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they
dive underwater.

swanna.name: Swanna
swanna.flavor_text:
Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in
the middle is the leader of the flock.

vanillite.name: Vanillite
vanillite.flavor_text:
Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an
icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees
Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.

vanillish.name: Vanillish
vanillish.flavor_text:
It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148
degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it
spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.

vanilluxe.name: Vanilluxe
vanilluxe.flavor_text:
People believe this Pokémon formed when two
Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is
roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.

deerling.name: Deerling
deerling.flavor_text:
The turning of the seasons changes the color and
scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark
the seasons.

sawsbuck.name: Sawsbuck
sawsbuck.flavor_text:
They migrate according to the seasons, so some
people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

emolga.name: Emolga
emolga.flavor_text:
This Pokémon absolutely loves sweet berries.
Sometimes it stuffs its cheeks full of so much
food that it can’t fly properly.

karrablast.name: Karrablast
karrablast.flavor_text:
It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through
Shelmet’s shell. Karrablast doesn’t eat the shell—
it eats only the contents.

escavalier.name: Escavalier
escavalier.flavor_text:
It charges its enemies, lances at the ready.
An image of one of its duels is captured in a famous
painting of Escavalier clashing with Sirfetch’d.

foongus.name: Foongus
foongus.flavor_text:
The spores released from this Pokémon’s hands
are highly poisonous, but when thoroughly dried,
the spores can be used as stomach medicine.

amoonguss.name: Amoonguss
amoonguss.flavor_text:
Amoonguss generally doesn’t move much. It
tends to stand still near Poké Balls that have
been dropped on the ground.

frillish.name: Frillish
frillish.flavor_text:
Legend has it that the residents of a sunken
ancient city changed into these Pokémon.

jellicent.name: Jellicent
jellicent.flavor_text:
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky,
schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of
the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.

alomomola.name: Alomomola
alomomola.flavor_text:
The reason it helps Pokémon in a weakened
condition is that any Pokémon coming after
them may also attack Alomomola.

joltik.name: Joltik
joltik.flavor_text:
Joltik latch on to other Pokémon and suck out
static electricity. They’re often found sticking to
Yamper’s hindquarters.

galvantula.name: Galvantula
galvantula.flavor_text:
It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests
of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are
not yet good at flying.

ferroseed.name: Ferroseed
ferroseed.flavor_text:
Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings.
Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s
spikes grow big and strong.

ferrothorn.name: Ferrothorn
ferrothorn.flavor_text:
Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon
crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes
on its feelers into the stone.

klink.name: Klink
klink.flavor_text:
It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration
behind ancient people’s invention of the
first gears.

klang.name: Klang
klang.flavor_text:
Many companies in the Galar region choose
Klang as their logo. This Pokémon is considered
the symbol of industrial technology.

klinklang.name: Klinklang
klinklang.flavor_text:
The three gears that compose this Pokémon
spin at high speed. Its new spiked gear isn’t
a living creature.

tynamo.name: Tynamo
tynamo.flavor_text:
One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity,
so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful
electric shock.

eelektrik.name: Eelektrik
eelektrik.flavor_text:
These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they
spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it
with electricity.

eelektross.name: Eelektross
eelektross.flavor_text:
They crawl out of the ocean using their arms.
They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag
it into the ocean.

elgyem.name: Elgyem
elgyem.flavor_text:
This Pokémon was discovered about 50 years
ago. Its highly developed brain enables it to
exert its psychic powers.

beheeyem.name: Beheeyem
beheeyem.flavor_text:
Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields,
this Pokémon can control the memories of
its opponents.

litwick.name: Litwick
litwick.flavor_text:
The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs,
the brighter and eerier the flame on its
head burns.

lampent.name: Lampent
lampent.flavor_text:
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp.
Once it finds someone whose death is near,
it will trail quietly after them.

chandelure.name: Chandelure
chandelure.flavor_text:
In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of
lights, funerals were a constant occurrence—
or so it’s said.

axew.name: Axew
axew.flavor_text:
They play with each other by knocking their large
tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but
they grow back so quickly that it isn’t a concern.

fraxure.name: Fraxure
fraxure.flavor_text:
Its skin is as hard as a suit of armor. Fraxure’s
favorite strategy is to tackle its opponents,
stabbing them with its tusks at the same time.

haxorus.name: Haxorus
haxorus.flavor_text:
While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if
angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams
are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.

cubchoo.name: Cubchoo
cubchoo.flavor_text:
It sniffles before performing a move, using its
frosty snot to provide an icy element to any
move that needs it.

beartic.name: Beartic
beartic.flavor_text:
It swims energetically through frigid seas.
When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater
with its breath so it can rest on the ice.

cryogonal.name: Cryogonal
cryogonal.flavor_text:
When the weather gets hot, these Pokémon turn
into water vapor. Cryogonal are almost never
seen during summer.

shelmet.name: Shelmet
shelmet.flavor_text:
It has a strange physiology that responds to
electricity. When together with Karrablast,
Shelmet evolves for some reason.

accelgor.name: Accelgor
accelgor.flavor_text:
Discarding its shell made it nimble. To keep
itself from dehydrating, it wraps its body in
bands of membrane.

stunfisk.name: Stunfisk
stunfisk.flavor_text:
For some reason, this Pokémon smiles slightly
when it emits a strong electric current from the
yellow markings on its body.

mienfoo.name: Mienfoo
mienfoo.flavor_text:
Though small, Mienfoo’s temperament is fierce.
Any creature that approaches Mienfoo carelessly
will be greeted with a flurry of graceful attacks.

mienshao.name: Mienshao
mienshao.flavor_text:
Delivered at blinding speeds, kicks from this
Pokémon can shatter massive boulders into
tiny pieces.

druddigon.name: Druddigon
druddigon.flavor_text:
Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up
residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon,
treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.

golett.name: Golett
golett.flavor_text:
This Pokémon was created from clay. It received
orders from its master many thousands of years
ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.

golurk.name: Golurk
golurk.flavor_text:
There’s a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual
motion machine that produces limitless energy,
but this belief hasn’t been proven.

pawniard.name: Pawniard
pawniard.flavor_text:
A pack of these Pokémon forms to serve a
Bisharp boss. Each Pawniard trains diligently,
dreaming of one day taking the lead.

bisharp.name: Bisharp
bisharp.flavor_text:
Violent conflicts erupt between Bisharp and
Fraxure over places where sharpening stones
can be found.

bouffalant.name: Bouffalant
bouffalant.flavor_text:
These Pokémon live in herds of about 20
individuals. Bouffalant that betray the herd will
lose the hair on their heads for some reason.

rufflet.name: Rufflet
rufflet.flavor_text:
Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its
parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.

braviary.name: Braviary
braviary.flavor_text:
Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious
bird Pokémon goes out on the hunt. It blasts lakes with shock
waves, then scoops up any prey that float to the water's surface.

vullaby.name: Vullaby
vullaby.flavor_text:
Vullaby grow quickly. Bones that have gotten too
small for older Vullaby to wear often get passed
down to younger ones in the nest.

mandibuzz.name: Mandibuzz
mandibuzz.flavor_text:
They adorn themselves with bones. There seem
to be fashion trends among them, as different
bones come into and fall out of popularity.

heatmor.name: Heatmor
heatmor.flavor_text:
A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the
hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour
their insides.

durant.name: Durant
durant.flavor_text:
With their large mandibles, these Pokémon can
crunch their way through rock. They work
together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.

deino.name: Deino
deino.flavor_text:
Because it can’t see, this Pokémon is constantly
biting at everything it touches, trying to keep
track of its surroundings.

zweilous.name: Zweilous
zweilous.flavor_text:
Their two heads will fight each other over a
single piece of food. Zweilous are covered in
scars even without battling others.

hydreigon.name: Hydreigon
hydreigon.flavor_text:
The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into
the opponent. Their attacks won’t slow until their
target goes down.

larvesta.name: Larvesta
larvesta.flavor_text:
Larvesta’s body is warm all over. It spouts fire
from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators
and scare prey.

volcarona.name: Volcarona
volcarona.flavor_text:
This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of
raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as
a deity of fire.

cobalion.name: Cobalion
cobalion.flavor_text:
From the moment it’s born, this Pokémon
radiates the air of a leader. Its presence will
calm even vicious foes.

terrakion.name: Terrakion
terrakion.flavor_text:
In Unovan legend, Terrakion battled against
humans in an effort to protect other Pokémon.

virizion.name: Virizion
virizion.flavor_text:
It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick
movements, slicing them up with its horns.

tornadus.name: Tornadus
tornadus.flavor_text:
This storm-stirring Pokémon is said to cause the seasons to
turn by whipping up the air. I suspect its humanlike form to be
a false one.

thundurus.name: Thundurus
thundurus.flavor_text:
They say this wielder of electricity has waged war with its
nemesis, Tornadus, since time immemorial. The lightning bolts
it hurls pierce the very earth and enrich the soil.

reshiram.name: Reshiram

zekrom.name: Zekrom
zekrom.flavor_text:
Mythology tells us that if people lose the
righteousness in their hearts, their kingdoms
will be razed by Zekrom’s lightning.

landorus.name: Landorus
landorus.flavor_text:
When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus
arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts
abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.

kyurem.name: Kyurem
kyurem.flavor_text:
It appears that this Pokémon uses its powers over
ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its
cellular structure.

keldeo.name: Keldeo
keldeo.flavor_text:
They say that Keldeo must survive harsh battles
and fully develop the horn on its forehead
before this Pokémon’s true power will awaken.

meloetta.name: Meloetta
meloetta.flavor_text:
Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization
method that can control the feelings of those who
hear it.

genesect.name: Genesect
genesect.flavor_text:
This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team
Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

chespin.name: Chespin
chespin.flavor_text:
Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back
that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.

quilladin.name: Quilladin
quilladin.flavor_text:
They strengthen their lower bodies by
running into one another. They are very
kind and won’t start fights.

chesnaught.name: Chesnaught
chesnaught.flavor_text:
When it takes a defensive posture with its fists
guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

fennekin.name: Fennekin
fennekin.flavor_text:
As it walks, it munches on a twig in place
of a snack. It intimidates opponents
by puffing hot air out of its ears.

braixen.name: Braixen
braixen.flavor_text:
When the twig is plucked from its tail,
friction sets the twig alight. The flame
is used to send signals to its allies.

delphox.name: Delphox
delphox.flavor_text:
Using psychic power, it generates a
fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit,
incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

froakie.name: Froakie
froakie.flavor_text:
It protects its skin by covering its body in
delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air,
it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

frogadier.name: Frogadier
frogadier.flavor_text:
Its swiftness is unparalleled.
It can scale a tower of more
than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.

greninja.name: Greninja
greninja.flavor_text:
It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace.
It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while
slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

bunnelby.name: Bunnelby
bunnelby.flavor_text:
It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of
Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby
digging a hole to hide underground in moments.

diggersby.name: Diggersby
diggersby.flavor_text:
The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally
well. People used to make heavy winter clothing
from fur shed by this Pokémon.

fletchling.name: Fletchling
fletchling.flavor_text:
When this Pokémon gets excited, its body
temperature increases sharply. If you touch a
Fletchling with bare hands, you might get burned.

fletchinder.name: Fletchinder
fletchinder.flavor_text:
Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and
aggressive. These Pokémon fight among
themselves over feeding grounds.

talonflame.name: Talonflame
talonflame.flavor_text:
Talonflame dives toward prey at speeds of up to
310 mph and assaults them with powerful kicks,
giving the prey no chance to escape.

scatterbug.name: Scatterbug
scatterbug.flavor_text:
The powder that covers its body
regulates its temperature, so it
can live in any region or climate.

spewpa.name: Spewpa
spewpa.flavor_text:
The beaks of bird Pokémon can’t begin
to scratch its stalwart body.
To defend itself, it spews powder.

vivillon.name: Vivillon
vivillon.flavor_text:
The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings
depend on the climate and topography
of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

litleo.name: Litleo
litleo.flavor_text:
This hot-blooded Pokémon is filled with
curiosity. When it gets angry or starts
fighting, its short mane gets hot.

pyroar.name: Pyroar
pyroar.flavor_text:
The temperature of its breath is over 10,000
degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesn’t use it on
its prey. This Pokémon prefers to eat raw meat.

flabebe.name: Flabébé
flabebe.flavor_text:
Flabébé wears a crown made from pollen it’s
collected from its flower. The crown has hidden
healing properties.

floette.name: Floette
floette.flavor_text:
It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its
heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives
anyone who messes up a flower bed.

florges.name: Florges
florges.flavor_text:
Its life can span several hundred years. It’s said
to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.

skiddo.name: Skiddo
skiddo.flavor_text:
If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t
need to eat, because it can generate
energy from the leaves on its back.

gogoat.name: Gogoat
gogoat.flavor_text:
They inhabit mountainous regions.
The leader of the herd is decided by
a battle of clashing horns.

pancham.name: Pancham
pancham.flavor_text:
Wanting to make sure it’s taken seriously,
Pancham’s always giving others a glare.
But if it’s not focusing, it ends up smiling.

pangoro.name: Pangoro
pangoro.flavor_text:
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of
its opponents. It strikes with punches that can
turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.

furfrou.name: Furfrou
furfrou.flavor_text:
Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer,
but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.

espurr.name: Espurr
espurr.flavor_text:
There’s enough psychic power in Espurr to send a
wrestler flying, but because this power can’t be
controlled, Espurr finds it troublesome.

meowstic.name: Meowstic
meowstic.flavor_text:
The defensive instinct of the males is strong.
It’s when they’re protecting themselves or their
partners that they unleash their full power.

honedge.name: Honedge
honedge.flavor_text:
The blue eye on the sword’s handguard is the
true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it
drains people’s lives away.

doublade.name: Doublade
doublade.flavor_text:
The two swords employ a strategy of rapidly
alternating between offense and defense to
bring down their prey.

aegislash.name: Aegislash
aegislash.flavor_text:
Its potent spectral powers allow it to manipulate
others. It once used its powers to force people
and Pokémon to build a kingdom to its liking.

spritzee.name: Spritzee
spritzee.flavor_text:
The scent its body gives off enraptures those
who smell it. Noble ladies had no shortage of
love for Spritzee.

aromatisse.name: Aromatisse
aromatisse.flavor_text:
The scents Aromatisse can produce range from
sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells
that sap an opponent’s will to fight.

swirlix.name: Swirlix
swirlix.flavor_text:
The sweet smell of cotton candy perfumes
Swirlix’s fluffy fur. This Pokémon spits out
sticky string to tangle up its enemies.

slurpuff.name: Slurpuff
slurpuff.flavor_text:
Slurpuff’s fur contains a lot of air, making it soft
to the touch and lighter than it looks.

inkay.name: Inkay
inkay.flavor_text:
By exposing foes to the blinking of its
luminescent spots, Inkay demoralizes them,
and then it seizes the chance to flee.

malamar.name: Malamar
malamar.flavor_text:
It’s said that Malamar’s hypnotic powers played
a role in certain history-changing events.

binacle.name: Binacle
binacle.flavor_text:
If the two don’t work well together, both their
offense and defense fall apart. Without good
teamwork, they won’t survive.

barbaracle.name: Barbaracle
barbaracle.flavor_text:
Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep
watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start
to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.

skrelp.name: Skrelp
skrelp.flavor_text:
Skrelp looks like a piece of rotten seaweed, so it
can blend in with seaweed drifting on the ocean
and avoid being detected by enemies.

dragalge.name: Dragalge
dragalge.flavor_text:
Dragalge generates dragon energy by sticking
the plume on its head out above the ocean’s
surface and bathing it in sunlight.

clauncher.name: Clauncher
clauncher.flavor_text:
By detonating gas that accumulates in its right
claw, this Pokémon launches water like a bullet.
This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.

clawitzer.name: Clawitzer
clawitzer.flavor_text:
Clawitzer’s right arm is a cannon that launches
projectiles made of seawater. Shots from a
Clawitzer’s cannon arm can sink a tanker.

helioptile.name: Helioptile
helioptile.flavor_text:
The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity
generation. Interruption of that process
stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.

heliolisk.name: Heliolisk
heliolisk.flavor_text:
One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill
outspread is all it would take to produce enough
electricity to power a city.

tyrunt.name: Tyrunt
tyrunt.flavor_text:
This Pokémon is selfish and likes to be pampered.
It can also inflict grievous wounds on its Trainer
just by playing around.

tyrantrum.name: Tyrantrum
tyrantrum.flavor_text:
A single bite of Tyrantrum’s massive jaws will
demolish a car. This Pokémon was the king of the
ancient world.

amaura.name: Amaura
amaura.flavor_text:
Amaura is an ancient Pokémon that has gone
extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes
be found frozen in ice.

aurorus.name: Aurorus
aurorus.flavor_text:
When gripped by rage, Aurorus will emanate
freezing air, covering everything around it in ice.

sylveon.name: Sylveon
sylveon.flavor_text:
It emits a soothing aura from its ribbon-shaped organs. It wraps
these appendages around quarrelers to instantly restore calm to
the situation.

hawlucha.name: Hawlucha
hawlucha.flavor_text:
It always strikes a pose before going for its
finishing move. Sometimes opponents take
advantage of that time to counterattack.

dedenne.name: Dedenne
dedenne.flavor_text:
Since Dedenne can’t generate much electricity on
its own, it steals electricity from outlets or other
electric Pokémon.

carbink.name: Carbink
carbink.flavor_text:
It’s said that somewhere in the world, there’s
a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering
Carbink. It’s also said that this pack has a queen.

goomy.name: Goomy
goomy.flavor_text:
Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and
humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon
instantly becomes lethargic.

sliggoo.name: Sliggoo
sliggoo.flavor_text:
A creature given to melancholy. I suspect its metallic shell
developed as a result of the mucus on its skin reacting with
the iron in Hisui's water.

goodra.name: Goodra
goodra.flavor_text:
Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell.
It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy—it will fume and
run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.

klefki.name: Klefki
klefki.flavor_text:
Klefki sucks in metal ions with the horn topping
its head. It seems this Pokémon loves keys so
much that its head needed to look like one, too.

phantump.name: Phantump
phantump.flavor_text:
With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to
lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost
among the trees.

trevenant.name: Trevenant
trevenant.flavor_text:
Small roots that extend from the tips of this
Pokémon’s feet can tie into the trees of the
forest and give Trevenant control over them.

pumpkaboo.name: Pumpkaboo
pumpkaboo.flavor_text:
The light that streams out from the holes in the
pumpkin can hypnotize and control the people
and Pokémon that see it.

gourgeist.name: Gourgeist
gourgeist.flavor_text:
In the darkness of a new-moon night, Gourgeist
will come knocking. Whoever answers the door
will be swept off to the afterlife.

bergmite.name: Bergmite
bergmite.flavor_text:
Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water
vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.

avalugg.name: Avalugg
avalugg.flavor_text:
The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and
can shatter rocks with ease. This Pokémon barrels along steep
mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.

noibat.name: Noibat
noibat.flavor_text:
No wavelength of sound is beyond Noibat’s
ability to produce. The ultrasonic waves it
generates can overcome much larger Pokémon.

noivern.name: Noivern
noivern.flavor_text:
Flying through the darkness, it weakens enemies
with ultrasonic waves that could crush stone.
Its fangs finish the fight.

xerneas.name: Xerneas
xerneas.flavor_text:
When the horns on its head shine
in seven colors, it is said to be
sharing everlasting life.

yveltal.name: Yveltal
yveltal.flavor_text:
When its life comes to an end, it absorbs
the life energy of every living thing
and turns into a cocoon once more.

zygarde.name: Zygarde
zygarde.flavor_text:
Some say it can change to an even more
powerful form when battling those who threaten
the ecosystem.

diancie.name: Diancie
diancie.flavor_text:
It can instantly create many diamonds
by compressing the carbon in the air
between its hands.

hoopa.name: Hoopa
hoopa.flavor_text:
It is said to be able to seize anything it desires
with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power
sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.

volcanion.name: Volcanion
volcanion.flavor_text:
It expels its internal steam from the
arms on its back. It has enough
power to blow away a mountain.

rowlet.name: Rowlet
rowlet.flavor_text:
Flies noiselessly on delicate wings. It has mastered the art of
deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers from those same wings.

dartrix.name: Dartrix
dartrix.flavor_text:
Regularly basks in sunlight to gather power—presumably due to
the frigid climate. Nonetheless, the edges of the blade quills set
into its wings are keen as ever.

decidueye.name: Decidueye
decidueye.flavor_text:
The air stored inside the rachises of Decidueye's feathers
insulates the Pokémon against Hisui's extreme cold. This is
firm proof that evolution can be influenced by environment.

litten.name: Litten
litten.flavor_text:
Trying to pet Litten before it trusts you will
result in a nasty scratch from its sharp claws.
Be careful.

torracat.name: Torracat
torracat.flavor_text:
When facing a powerful enemy, Torracat’s
fighting spirit gets pumped up, and its fire bell
blazes hotter.

incineroar.name: Incineroar
incineroar.flavor_text:
Incineroar’s rough and aggressive behavior is its
most notable trait, but the way it helps out small
Pokémon shows that it has a kind side as well.

popplio.name: Popplio
popplio.flavor_text:
If Popplio want to create big, powerful balloons,
they must be persistent. It takes daily practice for
these Pokémon to develop their skills.

brionne.name: Brionne
brionne.flavor_text:
On nights when the sea is calm, Brionne dance
with one another to the singing of the Primarina
that’s leading them.

primarina.name: Primarina
primarina.flavor_text:
For Primarina, every battle’s a stage. Its singing
and the dancing of its balloons will mesmerize
the audience.

pikipek.name: Pikipek
pikipek.flavor_text:
It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are
heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times
per second!

trumbeak.name: Trumbeak
trumbeak.flavor_text:
From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries
it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise
to new plants.

toucannon.name: Toucannon
toucannon.flavor_text:
Known for forming harmonious couples, this
Pokémon is brought to wedding ceremonies as a
good luck charm.

yungoos.name: Yungoos
yungoos.flavor_text:
Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh
living things, so it marches down streets
in search of prey.

gumshoos.name: Gumshoos
gumshoos.flavor_text:
Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of
itself and pounces when it spots its favorite
meal—Rattata!

grubbin.name: Grubbin
grubbin.flavor_text:
It uses its big jaws to dig nests into the forest
floor, and it loves to feed on sweet tree sap.

charjabug.name: Charjabug
charjabug.flavor_text:
Its digestive processes convert the leaves it eats
into electricity. An electric sac in its belly stores
the electricity for later use.

vikavolt.name: Vikavolt
vikavolt.flavor_text:
If it carries a Charjabug to use as a spare battery,
a flying Vikavolt can rapidly fire high-powered
beams of electricity.

crabrawler.name: Crabrawler
crabrawler.flavor_text:
Crabrawler has been known to mistake
Exeggutor for a coconut tree and climb it. The
enraged Exeggutor shakes it off and stomps it.

crabominable.name: Crabominable
crabominable.flavor_text:
Before it stops to think, it just starts pummeling.
There are records of its turning back
avalanches with a flurry of punches.

oricorio.name: Oricorio
oricorio.flavor_text:
This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer
gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokémon
becomes fiercely angry.

cutiefly.name: Cutiefly
cutiefly.flavor_text:
An opponent’s aura can tell Cutiefly what that
opponent’s next move will be. Then Cutiefly can
glide around the attack and strike back.

ribombee.name: Ribombee
ribombee.flavor_text:
Ribombee absolutely hate getting wet or
rained on. In the cloudy Galar region,
they are very seldom seen.

rockruff.name: Rockruff
rockruff.flavor_text:
This Pokémon intimidates opponents by striking
the ground with the rocks on its neck. The
moment an opponent flinches, Rockruff attacks.

lycanroc.name: Lycanroc
lycanroc.flavor_text:
With swift movements, this Pokémon gradually
backs its prey into a corner. Lycanroc’s fangs are
always aimed toward opponents’ weak spots.

wishiwashi.name: Wishiwashi
wishiwashi.flavor_text:
When it senses danger, its eyes tear up.
The sparkle of its tears signals other
Wishiwashi to gather.

mareanie.name: Mareanie
mareanie.flavor_text:
Unlike their Alolan counterparts, the Mareanie
of the Galar region have not yet figured out
that the branches of Corsola are delicious.

toxapex.name: Toxapex
toxapex.flavor_text:
Within the poison sac in its body is a poison so
toxic that Pokémon as large as Wailord will still
be suffering three days after it first takes effect.

mudbray.name: Mudbray
mudbray.flavor_text:
It eats dirt to create mud and smears this mud all
over its feet, giving them the grip needed to walk
on rough terrain without slipping.

mudsdale.name: Mudsdale
mudsdale.flavor_text:
Mudsdale has so much stamina that it could carry
over 10 tons across the Galar region without rest
or sleep.

dewpider.name: Dewpider
dewpider.flavor_text:
Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it
comes onto land in search of food, it takes
water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.

araquanid.name: Araquanid
araquanid.flavor_text:
It acts as a caretaker for Dewpider, putting them
inside its bubble and letting them eat any
leftover food.

fomantis.name: Fomantis
fomantis.flavor_text:
During the day, Fomantis basks in sunlight and
sleeps peacefully. It wakes and moves around
at night.

lurantis.name: Lurantis
lurantis.flavor_text:
The petals on this Pokémon’s arms are thin and
super sharp, and they can fire laser beams if
Lurantis gathers light first.

morelull.name: Morelull
morelull.flavor_text:
Morelull live in forests that stay dark even
during the day. They scatter flickering spores
that put enemies to sleep.

shiinotic.name: Shiinotic
shiinotic.flavor_text:
If you see a light deep in a forest at night,
don’t go near. Shiinotic will make you fall
fast asleep.

salandit.name: Salandit
salandit.flavor_text:
This sneaky Pokémon will slink behind its prey
and immobilize it with poisonous gas before the
prey even realizes Salandit is there.

salazzle.name: Salazzle
salazzle.flavor_text:
The winner of competitions between Salazzle
is decided by which one has the most male
Salandit with it.

stufful.name: Stufful
stufful.flavor_text:
The way it protects itself by flailing its arms may
be an adorable sight, but stay well away. This is
flailing that can snap thick tree trunks.

bewear.name: Bewear
bewear.flavor_text:
The moves it uses to take down its prey would
make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued
prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.

bounsweet.name: Bounsweet
bounsweet.flavor_text:
When under attack, it secretes a sweet
and delicious sweat. The scent only calls
more enemies to it.

steenee.name: Steenee
steenee.flavor_text:
Any Corvisquire that pecks at this
Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from
its sepals followed by a sharp kick.

tsareena.name: Tsareena
tsareena.flavor_text:
A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s
legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and
soul that will never heal.

comfey.name: Comfey
comfey.flavor_text:
These Pokémon smell very nice. All Comfey wear
different flowers, so each of these Pokémon has
its own individual scent.

oranguru.name: Oranguru
oranguru.flavor_text:
It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes
across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will
gather medicinal herbs to treat it.

passimian.name: Passimian
passimian.flavor_text:
Passimian live in groups of about 20, with
each member performing an assigned role.
Through cooperation, the group survives.

wimpod.name: Wimpod
wimpod.flavor_text:
Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the
lookout for danger. They scatter the moment
they detect an enemy’s presence.

golisopod.name: Golisopod
golisopod.flavor_text:
They live in sunken ships or in holes in the
seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct
battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.

sandygast.name: Sandygast
sandygast.flavor_text:
Sandygast mainly inhabits beaches. It takes
control of anyone who puts their hand into its
mouth, forcing them to make its body bigger.

palossand.name: Palossand
palossand.flavor_text:
This Pokémon lives on beaches, but it hates
water. Palossand can’t maintain its castle-like
shape if it gets drenched by a heavy rain.

pyukumuku.name: Pyukumuku
pyukumuku.flavor_text:
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a
foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means
to punch them.

type-null.name: Type: Null
type-null.flavor_text:
It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth.
The mask placed upon it limits its power in order
to keep it under control.

silvally.name: Silvally
silvally.flavor_text:
The final factor needed to release this
Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond
with a Trainer it trusts.

minior.name: Minior
minior.flavor_text:
Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable,
the shock of falling to the ground smashes the
shell to smithereens.

komala.name: Komala
komala.flavor_text:
It remains asleep from birth to death as a result
of the sedative properties of the leaves that
form its diet.

turtonator.name: Turtonator
turtonator.flavor_text:
Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes
explosive compounds to develop in its shell.
Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.

togedemaru.name: Togedemaru
togedemaru.flavor_text:
When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes
its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges
electricity indiscriminately.

mimikyu.name: Mimikyu
mimikyu.flavor_text:
There was a scientist who peeked under
Mimikyu’s old rag in the name of research.
The scientist died of a mysterious disease.

bruxish.name: Bruxish
bruxish.flavor_text:
Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanie’s
spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches
up the spikes and eats them.

drampa.name: Drampa
drampa.flavor_text:
Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until
it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a
gale and flattens everything around.

dhelmise.name: Dhelmise
dhelmise.flavor_text:
After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It
catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.

jangmo-o.name: Jangmo-o
jangmo-o.flavor_text:
Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with
others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s
become as hard as metal.

hakamo-o.name: Hakamo-o
hakamo-o.flavor_text:
Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its
scales together and roars. Its sharp claws
shred the opposition.

kommo-o.name: Kommo-o
kommo-o.flavor_text:
Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors
wearing armor made of Kommo-o scales.

tapu-koko.name: Tapu Koko
tapu-koko.flavor_text:
The lightning-wielding guardian deity of
Melemele, Tapu Koko is brimming with curiosity
and appears before people from time to time.

tapu-lele.name: Tapu Lele
tapu-lele.flavor_text:
Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is
devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and
can be described as nature incarnate.

tapu-bulu.name: Tapu Bulu
tapu-bulu.flavor_text:
It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others
know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts.
This guardian deity of Ula’ula controls plants.

tapu-fini.name: Tapu Fini
tapu-fini.flavor_text:
Although it’s called a guardian deity, terrible
calamities sometimes befall those who
recklessly approach Tapu Fini.

cosmog.name: Cosmog
cosmog.flavor_text:
Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious,
often placing itself in danger. If things start to
look dicey, it teleports away.

cosmoem.name: Cosmoem
cosmoem.flavor_text:
It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate,
frantically building up energy within its core as
preparation for evolution.

solgaleo.name: Solgaleo
solgaleo.flavor_text:
Solgaleo was once known as the Beast That
Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light
radiates boundlessly from it.

lunala.name: Lunala
lunala.flavor_text:
It steals the light from its surroundings and then
becomes the full moon, showering its own light
across the night sky.

nihilego.name: Nihilego
nihilego.flavor_text:
It appeared in this world from an Ultra
Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite
that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.

buzzwole.name: Buzzwole
buzzwole.flavor_text:
Buzzwole goes around showing off its
abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind
of Ultra Beast.

pheromosa.name: Pheromosa
pheromosa.flavor_text:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

xurkitree.name: Xurkitree
xurkitree.flavor_text:
They’ve been dubbed Ultra Beasts. Some of
them stand unmoving, like trees, with their
arms and legs stuck into the ground.

celesteela.name: Celesteela
celesteela.flavor_text:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

kartana.name: Kartana
kartana.flavor_text:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

guzzlord.name: Guzzlord
guzzlord.flavor_text:
An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be
constantly hungry—it is certainly always
devouring something.

necrozma.name: Necrozma
necrozma.flavor_text:
It needs light to survive, and it goes on a
rampage seeking it out. Its laser beams will
cut anything to pieces.

magearna.name: Magearna
magearna.flavor_text:
Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist,
the part called the Soul-Heart is the
actual life-form.

marshadow.name: Marshadow
marshadow.flavor_text:
This Pokémon can conceal itself in any shadow,
so it went undiscovered for a long time.

poipole.name: Poipole
poipole.flavor_text:
An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it
cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with
poison from the needles on its head.

naganadel.name: Naganadel
naganadel.flavor_text:
One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing,
venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid
is also immensely adhesive.

stakataka.name: Stakataka
stakataka.flavor_text:
When stone walls started moving and attacking,
the brute’s true identity was this mysterious
life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.

blacephalon.name: Blacephalon
blacephalon.flavor_text:
A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it
causes explosions, then takes advantage of
opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.

zeraora.name: Zeraora
zeraora.flavor_text:
Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs.
Wherever Zeraora runs, lightning flashes and
thunder echoes.

meltan.name: Meltan
meltan.flavor_text:
They live as a group, but when the time comes,
one strong Meltan will absorb all the others
and evolve.

melmetal.name: Melmetal
melmetal.flavor_text:
Centrifugal force is behind the punches of
Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said
to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.

grookey.name: Grookey
grookey.flavor_text:
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.
As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets
more and more pumped.

thwackey.name: Thwackey
thwackey.flavor_text:
When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it
gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even
notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.

rillaboom.name: Rillaboom
rillaboom.flavor_text:
The one with the best drumming techniques
becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle
disposition and values harmony among its group.

scorbunny.name: Scorbunny
scorbunny.flavor_text:
It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and
one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these
pads radiate tremendous heat.

raboot.name: Raboot
raboot.flavor_text:
It kicks berries right off the branches of trees
and then juggles them with its feet, practicing
its footwork.

cinderace.name: Cinderace
cinderace.flavor_text:
It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it
gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts
showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

sobble.name: Sobble
sobble.flavor_text:
When it gets wet, its skin changes color,
and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if
it were camouflaged.

drizzile.name: Drizzile
drizzile.flavor_text:
Highly intelligent but also very lazy,
it keeps enemies out of its territory
by laying traps everywhere.

inteleon.name: Inteleon
inteleon.flavor_text:
Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’
weak points so it can precisely blast them with
water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

skwovet.name: Skwovet
skwovet.flavor_text:
It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made
it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on
farms, searching for yet more berries.

greedent.name: Greedent
greedent.flavor_text:
Common throughout the Galar region, this
Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew
through the toughest of berry shells.

rookidee.name: Rookidee
rookidee.flavor_text:
Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied
Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest
opportunity to disorient larger opponents.

corvisquire.name: Corvisquire
corvisquire.flavor_text:
The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it
how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.

corviknight.name: Corviknight
corviknight.flavor_text:
With their great intellect and flying skills, these
Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar
region’s airborne taxi service.

blipbug.name: Blipbug
blipbug.flavor_text:
Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs
on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.

dottler.name: Dottler
dottler.flavor_text:
As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic
abilities to monitor the outside world and
prepare for evolution.

orbeetle.name: Orbeetle
orbeetle.flavor_text:
It emits psychic energy to observe and study
what’s around it—and what’s around it can
include things over six miles away.

nickit.name: Nickit
nickit.flavor_text:
Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by
stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with
swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.

thievul.name: Thievul
thievul.flavor_text:
With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes
around stealing food and eggs. Boltund
is its natural enemy.

gossifleur.name: Gossifleur
gossifleur.flavor_text:
It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous
song. This delightful display has charmed many
into raising this Pokémon.

eldegoss.name: Eldegoss
eldegoss.flavor_text:
The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be
spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar
regional specialty.

wooloo.name: Wooloo
wooloo.flavor_text:
If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be
able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this
Pokémon is surprisingly strong.

dubwool.name: Dubwool
dubwool.flavor_text:
Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the
opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

chewtle.name: Chewtle
chewtle.flavor_text:
It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard
horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this
Pokémon bites down and never lets go.

drednaw.name: Drednaw
drednaw.flavor_text:
This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck
to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and
take them down.

yamper.name: Yamper
yamper.flavor_text:
This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with
their work because it wants treats. As it runs,
it crackles with electricity.

boltund.name: Boltund
boltund.flavor_text:
It sends electricity through its legs to boost their
strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks
50 mph.

rolycoly.name: Rolycoly
rolycoly.flavor_text:
It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough,
rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.

carkol.name: Carkol
carkol.flavor_text:
By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over
18 mph. The temperature of the flames it
breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

coalossal.name: Coalossal
coalossal.flavor_text:
While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal
will burn bright red, sending off sparks that
scorch the surrounding area.

applin.name: Applin
applin.flavor_text:
As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not
only does the apple serve as its food source, but
the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.

flapple.name: Flapple
flapple.flavor_text:
It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a
powerful acid. It can also change its shape
into that of an apple.

appletun.name: Appletun
appletun.flavor_text:
Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the
skin on its back is especially yummy. Children
used to have it as a snack.

silicobra.name: Silicobra
silicobra.flavor_text:
It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy
is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.

sandaconda.name: Sandaconda
sandaconda.flavor_text:
Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand
out of its sand sac more efficiently.

cramorant.name: Cramorant
cramorant.flavor_text:
This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole.
Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to
swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.

arrokuda.name: Arrokuda
arrokuda.flavor_text:
After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become
extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant
swallows it up.

barraskewda.name: Barraskewda
barraskewda.flavor_text:
It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging
forward at speeds of over 100 knots before
ramming prey and spearing into them.

toxel.name: Toxel
toxel.flavor_text:
It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison
to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it
can cause a tingling paralysis.

toxtricity.name: Toxtricity
toxtricity.flavor_text:
This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon
chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it
might contain.

sizzlipede.name: Sizzlipede
sizzlipede.flavor_text:
It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking
them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will
voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.

centiskorch.name: Centiskorch
centiskorch.flavor_text:
While its burning body is already dangerous on
its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has
large and very sharp fangs.

clobbopus.name: Clobbopus
clobbopus.flavor_text:
Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed
when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back.
It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.

grapploct.name: Grapploct
grapploct.flavor_text:
Searching for an opponent to test its skills
against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle
is over, it returns to the sea.

sinistea.name: Sinistea
sinistea.flavor_text:
The teacup in which this Pokémon makes its
home is a famous piece of antique tableware.
Many forgeries are in circulation.

polteageist.name: Polteageist
polteageist.flavor_text:
Leaving leftover black tea unattended is asking
for this Pokémon to come along and pour itself
into it, turning the tea into a new Polteageist.

hatenna.name: Hatenna
hatenna.flavor_text:
If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it
will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas
without people.

hattrem.name: Hattrem
hattrem.flavor_text:
Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to
get them to quiet down. One blow from those
braids would knock out a professional boxer.

hatterene.name: Hatterene
hatterene.flavor_text:
If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn
apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon
is also known as the Forest Witch.

impidimp.name: Impidimp
impidimp.flavor_text:
It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things
and feasting on the negative energy of the
frustrated occupants.

morgrem.name: Morgrem
morgrem.flavor_text:
With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the
woods. Some believe it to have the power to
make crops grow.

grimmsnarl.name: Grimmsnarl
grimmsnarl.flavor_text:
Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs
unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring
them as tentacles would.

obstagoon.name: Obstagoon
obstagoon.flavor_text:
It evolved after experiencing numerous fights.
While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that
would make any opponent flinch.

perrserker.name: Perrserker
perrserker.flavor_text:
After many battles, it evolved dangerous
claws that come together to form daggers
when extended.

cursola.name: Cursola
cursola.flavor_text:
Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body
surrounding its soul. You’ll become
stiff as stone if you touch it.

sirfetchd.name: Sirfetch’d
sirfetchd.flavor_text:
After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield,
it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek
stalk is both weapon and food.

mr-rime.name: Mr. Rime
mr-rime.flavor_text:
Its amusing movements make it very popular.
It releases its psychic power from the pattern
on its belly.

runerigus.name: Runerigus
runerigus.flavor_text:
Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be
shown the horrific memories behind the picture
carved into it.

milcery.name: Milcery
milcery.flavor_text:
They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery
is guaranteed success and good fortune.

alcremie.name: Alcremie
alcremie.flavor_text:
When Alcremie is content, the cream it
secretes from its hands becomes sweeter
and richer.

falinks.name: Falinks
falinks.flavor_text:
The six of them work together as one Pokémon.
Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they
constantly change their formation as they fight.

pincurchin.name: Pincurchin
pincurchin.flavor_text:
It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets
broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for
at least three hours.

snom.name: Snom
snom.flavor_text:
It eats snow that piles up on the ground.
The more snow it eats, the bigger and more
impressive the spikes on its back grow.

frosmoth.name: Frosmoth
frosmoth.flavor_text:
It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields
and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings,
causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.

stonjourner.name: Stonjourner
stonjourner.flavor_text:
Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific
time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in
a circle.

eiscue.name: Eiscue
eiscue.flavor_text:
This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool
with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single
hair into the sea to lure in prey.

indeedee.name: Indeedee
indeedee.flavor_text:
Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions
of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the
source of its strength.

morpeko.name: Morpeko
morpeko.flavor_text:
It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if
they’re precious treasures. No matter how much
it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.

cufant.name: Cufant
cufant.flavor_text:
If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon
will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the
rain, turning a vibrant green color.

copperajah.name: Copperajah
copperajah.flavor_text:
These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have
incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush
giant rocks into powder.

dracozolt.name: Dracozolt
dracozolt.flavor_text:
The powerful muscles in its tail generate its
electricity. Compared to its lower body,
its upper half is entirely too small.

arctozolt.name: Arctozolt
arctozolt.flavor_text:
This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and
was able to preserve food with the ice on its
body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.

dracovish.name: Dracovish
dracovish.flavor_text:
Its mighty legs are capable of running at
speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon
can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.

arctovish.name: Arctovish
arctovish.flavor_text:
The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but
breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go
extinct anyway.

duraludon.name: Duraludon
duraludon.flavor_text:
The special metal that composes its body is very
light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility.
It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.

dreepy.name: Dreepy
dreepy.flavor_text:
If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child
could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help
it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.

drakloak.name: Drakloak
drakloak.flavor_text:
Without a Dreepy to place on its head and
care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute
any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.

dragapult.name: Dragapult
dragapult.flavor_text:
Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s
horns eagerly look forward to being launched out
at Mach speeds.

zacian.name: Zacian
zacian.flavor_text:
This Pokémon has slumbered for many years.
Some say it’s Zamazenta’s elder sister—others
say the two Pokémon are rivals.

zamazenta.name: Zamazenta
zamazenta.flavor_text:
This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of
a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot
that it ever existed.

eternatus.name: Eternatus
eternatus.flavor_text:
It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years
ago. There seems to be a connection between
this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
